title: Founding Software/AI Engineer
description:
**--- PLEASE READ BEFORE APPLYING ---** 





 \*This role is not salaried, we are a startup who will
 
 raise until we know what our next looks like.
 
 . Compensation is only equity based today. You will be at the forefront of an AI-first Fintech company aimed at building the best-in-class tools for our customers.\*
 




  




 Company description
 
 Our mission is to put useful AI in the hands of knowledge workers in finance. Quantera is dedicated to changing the way financial work is done. Data is scattered, unstructured and not made to be accessible, we surface insights from simplifying complex data to helping our customers make informed decisions.
 



  





**Job Type: Full time/Half time** 




  





**Job Location: Stockholm, Sweden** 




  




 About the Role
 
 We're looking for exceptional founding engineers who will help shape our product and culture from day one. This isn't just about writing code. It is about building something meaningful with complete ownership over your domain.
 



 We're hiring across two key areas:
 


* **Founding AI Engineers** 
 – Building intelligent features and exploring the frontier of what's possible with LLMs and emerging AI technologies.
* **Founding Fullstack/Frontend Engineers** 
 – Crafting beautiful, intuitive user experiences that feel effortless to use. We are design driven and we would love for you to be as well.


 What Makes You a Great Fit
 
  





**You take full ownership.** 
 You don't wait to be told what to do. You identify problems, propose solutions, and see them through to completion. When something breaks, you fix it. When there's ambiguity, you clarify it. You treat the product like it's yours...because it is.
 



  





**You communicate obsessively.** 
 You keep stakeholders in the loop, document your decisions, and make your work visible. You can explain complex technical concepts to non-technical team members in ways that actually make sense.
 



  





**You have an eye for design.** 
 Good design isn't always something you see, but something you may never see. You understand that engineering and design aren't separate disciplines, they are intertwined. You notice interactions feel clunky, or when something could be more elegant.
 



  





**You're intellectually curious and hands-on.** 
 You're excited to experiment with the latest AI models, explore new technologies, and figure out what actually works. You prototype quickly and can get scrappy when you need to. You're a doer you'd rather ship something imperfect today than something perfect next month.
 



  




 What You'll Do
 * Build AI/ML pipelines and own the product from the ground up.
* As part of the founding team, you will directly with the founding team to define product direction and technical architecture.
* Ship fast, iterate based on feedback, and establish engineering practices that will scale.
* Collaborate closely with design and product to create experiences users love.
* Stay on the cutting edge, experiment with new AI models, frameworks, and tools to find what gives us an advantage.
* Communicate your progress, challenges, and learnings with clarity and transparency.
* Help shape our engineering culture and hire the next wave of exceptional talent.


 What We're Looking For
 * Strong engineering fundamentals and experience shipping production code
* For AI role: Experience with LLMs, prompt engineering, vector databases, or ML infrastructure
* For Fullstack/Frontend role: Deep expertise in modern web technologies (React, TypeScript, etc.) with a strong sense of UI/UX.
* Track record of taking initiative and delivering projects end-to-end.
* Comfort with ambiguity and rapid iteration in an early-stage environment.
* We don't care much for degrees, but a Computer Science/Information Systems or AI/ML major helps.
* Deep expertise in building modern, scalable backend solutions using languages like Python, TypeScript, Java, or similar.
* Strong experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) and containerisation technologies (Docker etc)
* Solid understanding of Micro services architecture, API design and databases.


 Bonus points: (We like a good startup mindset)
 * You have done the the 0 - 10 journey before in a fast growing startup/scale up.
* Experience in fintech, financial services, or legal.


 Why Join Us
 
 This is a rare opportunity to be a founding team member with significant ownership, influence, and upside. You'll work on hard problems,
 **ship quickly,** 
 and have real impact on both the product and the company we're building.
 



  





**To Apply:** 
 Send us a project you are most proud of when applying. Include links to your work (GitHub, portfolio, side projects, etc.) and let us know which role you're most interested in.
 



  





 We are a small team, our youngest team member is 18 and oldest is 50 year old, everyone at Quantera is a builder no matter the experience, we make music from a few notes and have learned the art of getting more from less. As we are in our infancy, ready to take on the giants! Are you ready to take the challenge?
 



  





*Quantera is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity & inclusion.*

title: Fullstack Developer - Node
description:
**At Hemnet, we’re not just building Sweden’s leading property platform – we’re shaping how people find their future homes. Now we’re looking for a Senior Fullstack Developer who’s excited about Node, service oriented architecture, and making a real impact.** 
  

  

 👉 Last application day November 30th
   

  

**The Role** 
  

  

 You’ll join a cross-functional team where your voice matters. As a senior developer, you’ll not only write great code but also help drive architectural discussions, mentoring teammates, and helping us move towards a modern, flexible platform.
   

  

 We’re on a journey towards a service oriented architecture, and your experience here will be key. You’ll work hands-on with Node and React (while also touching Ruby) and bring ideas that push us forward.
   

  

**What You’ll Do** 
  

  

 The team is responsible for the authentication solution and is currently focusing on personalization for our users. In this role, you’ll
   

  

* Contribute to both backend and frontend development (Node.js, Nest.js, Ruby, React, GraphQL)
* Help shape our architecture as we move towards a service oriented architecture
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and fellow engineers
* Share knowledge and inspire the team and our communities
* Bring your personality and perspective to make the team stronger and more diverse


  

  

**Who You Are** 
  

  

 We believe you are experienced in working with Node and React, but also that you are open to learning Ruby. You enjoy guiding, coaching, and sparking great discussions as well as value collaboration, diversity, and creating smart solutions together.
   

  

* You have senior-level experience as a Fullstack Developer
* Experience working in Node.js
* You’re willing to learn Ruby
* You’ve worked with large-scale applications and know the challenges of breaking down a monolith into a service oriented architecture


  

  

**I am your new manager 👋** 
  

  

 Hi!
   

  

 My name is Staffan, and I’ll be your new manager. I’ve been at Hemnet since 2019 but just recently joined our domain called Consumers. I’m really excited to support the teams that will be working on many new and important areas for Hemnet – including personalization and smarter search features.
   

  

 My leadership style is listening, transparent, accessible, and supportive, while also challenging you to take your next step. Hopefully, we’ll learn a lot from each other and have plenty of fun as we break new ground at Hemnet. As a team, we get things done; we know when and where value can be added, and we’re clear on our priorities.
   

  

 Why did I decide to join Hemnet? I was strongly drawn to the culture and atmosphere – a wonderful combination of kindness, inclusiveness, and helpfulness, paired with high ambitions and a strong drive forward. My impression is that the people and the workplace together create the perfect foundation for you to do the best work of your career.
   

  

 At Hemnet, we believe tech is better when built together. If you want to shape not only code but also the future of Sweden’s most loved housing platform, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**A Note on Inclusion 💚** 
  

  

 At Hemnet, we believe that diversity in gender, sexual orientation, ability, neurodiversity, cultural background and life experience makes us stronger. We welcome applicants of all identities and backgrounds.
   

  

 If you meet many but not all of the requirements, we encourage you to apply. We value curiosity, a strong sense of purpose and the motivation to learn and grow, alongside your skills and experiences.
   

  

**🏡 Your career at Hemnet** 
  

  

 With over 40 million visits each month, you’ll be part of Sweden’s most popular property platform – and one of the world’s most admired real estate platforms. But our size and reputation aren’t the only reasons why you and your 150+ colleagues enjoy working here.
   

  

 Since 1998, Hemnet has been an essential go-to place for millions of Swedes, guiding them through one of life’s biggest transitions: finding a new place to call home. We’re proud to make this life-changing, often stressful journey as seamless as possible.
   

  

 With access to vast amounts of data, you’ll have limitless opportunities to explore and create new features that enhance the experience for Sweden’s real estate agents, home buyers, and sellers.
   

  

 Our friendly Hemnet culture fosters a dynamic, playful environment where every voice is valued. Here, you’ll join a welcoming team that encourages you to thrive and grow, working alongside passionate colleagues from around the world.
   

  

**A Hybrid Way of Working** 
  

  

 Our vibrant office in central Stockholm is the hub of our collaboration and culture, providing a lively space that fosters team spirit. We come together in the office three days a week, with two flexible remote days. To be part of our team, it’s essential to be based in or near Stockholm.

title: Full-stack Developer
description:
**Start** 
 : January 2026
   

  

**Duration** 
 : Full time 40 h/week, until August 2026
   

  

**Location** 
 : Stockholm, hybrid work model
   

  

 We at Maandag Nordic are looking for a developer on behalf of a client working with technology-driven logistics and automation solutions. The company develops systems that combine software, hardware, and third-party technologies to support efficient operational processes across several sectors.
   

  

 In this role, you will be part of a small and experienced development team where you will contribute across a broad technical stack, including backend development, integrations, frontend components, and Python-based services. The environment offers short decision paths, close collaboration with other teams, and strong opportunities to influence both technical direction and daily work.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop and improve backend services built primarily in Java
* Work with Python-based components and various automation tools
* Support the development of frontend features using JavaScript/HTML
* Further develop internal solutions and the logistics platform
* Take part in architectural discussions, problem-solving, and ongoing technical improvements
* Collaborate closely with fellow developers, product teams, and other internal stakeholders


**Job requirements**
**Preferred Skills & Experience**
* Solid background in software development, ideally with senior-level expertise in Java
* Practical experience working with Python, and familiarity with C/C++ environments
* Competence in JavaScript/HTML, and preferably exposure to frameworks like Angular or Qt
* Academic education in IT, computer science, software engineering, or a similar discipline
* Strong communication skills in both written and spoken English, as well as a Scandinavian language
* A structured, analytical approach and the ability to work independently


**Application procedure**
 A Maandag® recruiter will assess your application as soon as possible to determine whether you are suitable for an open position.
   

  

**About The Company**
 If you are a good match, we would like to receive a CV in WORD format with motivation why you fit this assignment, your availability and any scheduled holidays.
   

  

 Why Maandag Nordic? With us, you’ll get the chance to really put your ideas into action. We offer a work environment where you can grow and learn through hands-on experience - trying things out, making mistakes, and improving.
   

  

 For more than 35 years, Maandag® has been at the forefront of empowering people and organisations. We not only help professionals get jobs, but also connect them with a future that matches their values, desires and ambitions. Because when people are truly in the right place, they can develop themselves, fulfil their dreams and go to work with fresh energy every day. The energy and power released in the process is a catalyst for growth for companies. We started in the Netherlands, but now we also help professionals and organisations in Belgium, Poland, Dubai and Sweden. Our extensive knowledge of different markets, coupled with our wide network, enables us to make perfect matches quickly.

title: Senior .Net Fullstack Developer
description:
At NOBA, we’re all about collaboration, curiosity, and tackling tech challenges together. As part of our skilled dev team, you’ll dive into both backend and frontend work, solving problems with people who genuinely enjoy building great things.
   

  

 We’re forming a brand-new development team in Stockholm and are looking for two
 **Senior .Net Fullstack Developers** 
 to join us. We aim to bring together people with varied backgrounds and experiences, united by a passion for solving tech challenges and building great digital solutions!
   

  

**About The Role**
 You’ll have the chance to work across the full stack, developing new web services, improving system usability, and maintaining existing solutions. You will be trusted in designing, building and implementing modern web services for internal and external users.
   

  

 We’re big on continuous learning and knowledge-sharing - plus, we believe in a healthy work-life balance, giving you time to recharge and pursue your passions outside of work. Join a team of friendly and highly skilled developers, based in the central of Stockholm.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Develop web applications with a focus on great user experiences
* Build internal tools that make life easier for your colleagues
* Lead the full lifecycle of projects, from concept to delivery
* Integrate third-party solutions
* Collaborate closely with fellow developers in an Agile environment.


**We Are Looking For You Who**
 Are a problem solver who’s not afraid to push beyond the comfort zone and try new things. Strong communication and teamwork are essential, and we’re after someone who isn’t shy about sharing their ideas. You’ll need:
   

  

* 5+ years of software development experience
* 3+ years in web development with C#/.Net/.NetCore
* 3+ years working with React or similar JavaScript frameworks
* Experience designing complex solutions with a focus on logical design
* Familiarity with Agile Scrum methodologies
* Experience with relational and document databases
* Fluency in English (written and spoken)


**It's Positive If You Have**
* Experience with Azure or other public cloud platforms
* Fluency in Swedish


 In addition to this, it is important to us that you recognize yourself in our values:
 **we are wholehearted** 
 ,
 **we collaborate** 
 and
 **we take the lead** 
 .
   

  

**Have you heard of NOBAVERSE?**
 In our NOBAVERSE, we value openness, trust, and diversity. Here, you can influence your own development and have fun along the way to achieving our goals – all in a workplace that’s a little extra
 *bubbly* 
 ! ✨
   

  

 Read more about our employee value proposition on our careers page
   

  

  

  

**Read more about how our recruitment process works in the FAQ.**
 We care for your privacy and, with reference to the GDPR, would like to ask you not to include any sensitive personal data in your application, for examples information about ethnic origin, political opinions, religious beliefs or information about your health.
   

  

**Read more about how we handle your personal data here.**
 If you have any questions or concerns about the position, please contact the responsible recruiter.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application! 🙏✨
   

  

 #FindersFee

title: Java Backend developer
description:
Remman Mobility Group is a strategic leader in the rapidly growing automotive remarketing industry. Backed by leading investors and offering competitive products, we're in an exciting growth phase. We believe our next stage of growth depends on the team we build, which is why we're looking for our next key contributor.
 



  





**About the Job:** 




 As a Senior System Developer in our IT team, you will share responsibility for the backend development of our systems. You will have a central role in the team, where your main focus will be to design and then develop the services for our finance and vehicle systems.
 



  





 Our system landscape includes both customer-facing applications and internal systems, which place different demands on both you and the systems. You will also be an important part of our technology monitoring and scouting, ensuring that chosen technologies and solutions remain relevant.
 



  





**What you’ll do:** 



* Designing REST services for our service platform in close collaboration with the business.
* Realizing and implementing designed services and features.
* Evaluating solutions from a scalable and security-conscious perspective.
* Ensuring our architecture is adhered to regarding policies, security requirements, and regulations.
* Collaborating closely with our frontend developers.
* Participating in our standups and contributing to knowledge sharing within the team.
* Managing incidents and taking responsibility for the entire development chain, from design to deployment.



  





**What we’re looking for:** 



* 5 - 10 years of experience in designing and developing systems.
* Deep understanding of our technology stack.
* Previous experience with scalable and event-driven systems.
* Previous experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps.
* Previous experience with automated testing.
* Proficiency in Swedish and English, both written and spoken.



  





**Highly Meritorious if you also have:** 



* Developed REST-based systems.
* Experience with OpenAPI.
* Experience with container orchestration.
* Experience with Spring Webflux



  





 We are looking for someone who is solution-oriented and analytical, and who can communicate complex technical solutions to various target groups.
 



  





**Our tech stack:** 



* Java
* Spring Framework
* MongoDB
* Docker
* Kubernetes
* Google Cloud



  





**What we offer** 




 A fast-growing company operating in an expanding market. We use a modern tech stack where you'll have a direct say in our technical direction and workflows. Our newly renovated office in Solna offers a modern and accessible workspace.
 



  





**About Remman** 




 At Remman Mobility Group, our family of companies drives innovation and excellence across the automotive remarketing ecosystem. Our group has six companies and 120 colleagues across offices in Stockholm, Linköping, Örebro and Helsinki. Each entity is uniquely positioned to deliver specialized solutions, from cutting-edge remarketing platforms to flexible payment services and operational support. Together, we create a dynamic network that empowers OEMs, leasing companies, and dealerships to succeed in an ever-evolving industry.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
🚀 Senior Software Engineer – High-Growth Payments Scale-Up
 



 📍 Stockholm (Hybrid – 1 day per week onsite)
 



 💰 Up to 85k SEK per month + Outstanding Stock Options
 



  





 Are you an experienced, hands-on developer looking to make a real impact in a fast-scaling fintech?
 



  





 CPS Group are supporting a high-performing payments platform scale-up in Stockholm that is expanding its engineering team and looking for a senior engineer who can help drive their next phase of growth.
 



  





 This is an exciting opportunity to join a company building modern, mission-critical infrastructure powering global payments. You’ll work across the full development lifecycle, shaping backend services that prioritise scalability, reliability, and seamless integrations.
 



  





 🔍 What They’re Looking For:
 



  




* Strong hands-on software engineering experience (Java, TypeScript or similar)
* Experience with Serverless patterns
* Experience designing and building cloud infrastructure – ideally AWS
* Comfortable owning services end-to-end: design, build, deploy, monitor
* Passion for clean, scalable architecture and modern engineering practices
* Collaborative mindset and interest in solving meaningful technical challenges



  





 💼 What You’ll Work On:
 



  




* Modern cloud-native backend services
* Containerised workloads, serverless patterns, IaC
* High-availability financial integrations
* A platform used by banks and global payment providers



  





 ⭐ Why This Is a Fantastic Opportunity:
 



  




* Join a high-performing fintech during an exciting growth phase
* Work with modern tech in a genuinely innovative payments environment
* Strong engineering culture with real ownership and influence
* One of the best stock-option packages in the market
* Flexible hybrid model – just 1 day per week in the Stockholm office



  





 If you're passionate about building scalable systems, enjoy working close to the code, and want to help shape the future of global payments, this is one worth exploring.
 



  





 Please email your CV to Sam John, who will set up a call to discuss the details of the role: Sjohn@cpsgroupuk.com

title: Software Engineer
description:
*Vi söker för närvarande erfarna mjukvaruutvecklare till vår utvecklingsavdelning inom marin mjukvara för framtidens försvar, mer specifikt vår framgångsrika produkt – 9LV CMS. Vi hanterar alla aspekter av utveckling från grunden – från plattformslösningar till användargränsytor.*
*Vill du ha flertalet kontaktytor mot teknisk expertis i våra olika kundprojekt och med en touch av engelska? Då har du precis hittat rätt!*
**Din roll**
 Våra mjukvaru-team ansvarar autonomt för sin kravhantering, design, implementation och test av mjukvara samt all detaljplanering som rör funktionen i de marina ledningssystemen. Våra kundprojekt ansvarar för att varje fartygsklass får ett system som är skräddarsytt efter deras behov.
   

  

 Vi behöver nu växa ytterligare i följande kompetensområden:
   

  

* Sensorer, simulatorer och vapenapplikationer – Applikationsutveckling, Java, C++, Ada, Docker, Git, JIRA i både Linux och Windows baserade miljöer
+ Meriterande: Erfarenhet av att hantera transformation av video strömmar från råa format till komprimerade format och vice versa


 Som mjukvaruutvecklare arbetar du med att leverera beställd funktionalitet, i rätt tid och till överenskommen budget. Det betyder att du kommer att arbeta praktiskt i teamets backlog för både sprint- och kvartalsplaneringar.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi tror att du har arbetat med mjukvaruutveckling i minst 10 år och nu känner dig redo för att testa en ny aspekt av mjukvaruutveckling. Du är intresserad av att bidra till det gemensamma genom att kommunicera med alla, från andra utvecklare, scrum masters och produktägare till kundprojektledare. Vi tror därför att du har ett samarbetstänkande där du kan se saker ur olika perspektiv som också uppmuntrar till ett öppet, förtroendefullt och innovativt klimat. Som person är du verkligen en doer, villig att lösa alla problem som behövs för att hjälpa organisationen att klara sina leveranser. Du har förmågan att kommunicera obehindrat på svenska och engelska, såväl i tal som skrift.
   

  

*Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.*
**Vad du blir en del av**
 Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Med 26 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem.
   

  

 Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga.

title: IT Developer (Opens in new window)
description:
IT Developer
   

  

 Stockholm, SE, 112 51
   

  

**Job ID:** 
 31526
   

  

 Welcome to Group Functions Technology. Would you like to be part of our diverse, expert software development capability? We are now looking for a Full Stack Python Developer to work with Risk & Compliance solutions in Stockholm.
   

  

 This is an opportunity for you to be part of some of the most exciting initiatives in Nordea on our journey to be a leading customer centric and digital bank, always compliant with regulatory requirements.
   

  

 Key topics in scope include data transformation as well as AI driven data enrichment, where the overall solution objective is to overlook that all parties involved act according to rules and regulations. And importantly, that this is done as efficiently as possible using modern ways of automation, including but not limited to AI.
   

  

 Nordea is a place where traditions meet tomorrow. We're not just a bank, we're a tech employer on a mission to evolve finance securely and responsibly. Together, we impact millions of people’s daily lives by ensuring they can access our solutions anytime, anywhere, while safeguarding their personal data and wealth. Join us in making an impact on the banking industry.
   

  

**About Our Team**
 Meet the Group Function Technology software development team. We partner closely with Group Functions to deliver tailored technology solutions to our employees and towards our regulators. Working in collaboration with other Group Technology units, we align technological strategies with business objectives, ensuring efficient implementation of solutions that meet the specific needs of each area and function.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
 We are looking for a forward leaning developer to work closely with Product Owners, Solution Architects and Analysts to refine epics, user stories and business requirements into technical design and working software, with high development standards and to implement some of the industry best practices.
   

  

 This involves building data integrations and data transformation logic, reading from and writing to various databases and APIs, securing data completeness and data reconciliations, building microservices and deployment pipelines, and utilizing LLMs both in the actual solutions (e.g. data enrichment) and for support in your role as developer. There are also elements of front-end development, although not as prominent.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.
   

  

**To Succeed In This Role, We Believe That You**
* are a team player who enjoys collaboration in a multicultural environment
* have a genuine interest to learn and develop within the area
* are appreciated for your positive approach and ability to turn challenges in to opportunities
* are good at engaging stakeholders at different levels
* are a skilled engineer at heart with passion for developing solutions and take pride in seeing your efforts paying off in form of a great business application


**Your Background And Skills Include**
* Advanced knowledge in Python development and configuration
* Intermediate LLM experience
* Cloud (AWS) experience
* REST API Python frameworks experience
* Experience of event-driven microservice-based architecture is a plus
* Experience reading from sources with Kafka/XML
* Knowledge of Flask (or similar) frameworks
* Familiar with PostgreSQL and Oracle PL/SQL
* Kerberos configuration knowledge


 Experience with automation of deployment pipelines (CI/CD) using e.g. Jenkins/Bamboo, Artifactory (jFrog), Docker and Kubernetes is beneficial.
   

  

 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
   

  

**Next steps**
 We kindly ask you to submit your application as soon as possible, but no later than 09/12/2025. Any applications or CVs sent by email, direct messages, or any other channel than our application forms, will not be accepted or considered.
   

  

 For information and questions regarding the team, role, or life at Nordea, don’t hesitate to contact our hiring manager Kenneth Schoultz, kenneth.schoultz@nordea.com. If you have any questions about our recruitment process, please reach out to our tech recruiter and main point of contact anna.dahlstrom@consult.nordea.com.
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics, and traits make us better at serving our customers and communities.
   

  

**We enable dreams and aspirations for a greater good**
**We build relationships.** 
 We add a personal touch to everything we do – when advising our customers, collaborating with colleagues, and meeting our potential candidates.
   

  

**We learn and develop.** 
 We take pride in being experts and thinking ahead. We use our expertise to meet our customers’ needs, from the simplest to the most complex. We bring a growth mindset to our work that enables us to focus on a broader perspective in our daily challenges.
   

  

**We lead change.** 
 We are responsible and aware of the impact of our decisions, both for our customers and for our local and global communities. Mindful of our responsibility towards current and future generations, we have made sustainability an integrated part of our business strategy.
   

  

**We are Nordea.** 
 We have a 200-year history of supporting and growing the Nordic economies and our values are deeply rooted in these open, progressive and collaborative societies. As one of the biggest employers in the Nordics, Poland and Estonia, you have excellent opportunities to evolve, develop and move forward with us. Studies show that members of underrepresented communities don’t apply for jobs unless they tick all the qualification boxes. If this is part of why you hesitate to apply, we would like you to reconsider and give it a chance. Maybe your profile fits our needs much better than you think.
   

  

 For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.

Professional Galaxy is looking for a
 **Back End Developer / Engineer** 
 for one of our clients.
   

  

 Our team is building the settlement and cash processing systems that drive how cash from our customers is processed and accounted for — enabling reliable, scalable financial operations across every market, product line, and partner. Our systems are essential to our stakeholder’s ability to track and report revenue and taxes, supporting all of our core business lines.
   

  

 As engineers on this team, we design and maintain the backend and data platform capabilities that power millions of transactions each day with precision. We build services that handle settlement and bank transactions, produce compliant financial records, and support regulatory requirements across global markets — all while staying agile to keep up with our evolving business model and staying in sync with our many payment partners. We build robust services that provide clarity over what’s happening under the hood of millions of daily transactions, enabling quick action to any disruption. Our modular, process-oriented components simplify the development, maintenance, and scaling of the critical Order to Cash enterprise process that underpin the financial operations.
   

  

 We are starting two major initiatives: a revamp of our historical settlement system in order to align with our modularity strategy as well as expanding into the adjacent domain of payment fees, which is a massive cost center in need of good data for analytics in order to optimize the space. We’re looking for engineers passionate about building complex, high-impact systems. You’ll work closely with stakeholders in Finance (Accounting and Payments), Product, and Engineering to design solutions that are scalable, auditable, and robust. If you’re energized by the challenge of transforming intricate business processes into clean, extensible platforms we’d love to have you on the team.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Gain deep expertise in client’s revenue and settlement systems, understanding how it enables financial operations, compliance, and strategic decision-making across the company.
* Design and implement scalable backend and data systems that process millions of transactions daily to enable the cash-application process and financial reporting.
* Build intuitive, self-serve tools that empower Finance teams to define and manage product-specific revenue and settlement configuration independently, without requiring engineering involvement.
* Develop and enhance modular platform capabilities that encodes critical enterprise workflows, promoting consistency, reusability, and ease of maintenance across financial systems.
* Partner closely with Engineers, Product and Finance stakeholders to design systems that are scalable, auditable, and highly reliable.
* Champion engineering best practices, strong architectural design, and operational excellence across backend and data platforms.
* Foster a collaborative team culture rooted in shared ownership, constructive feedback, and continuous improvement.


**Who You Are**
* You possess a T-shaped engineering skill set — deep expertise in either data or backend engineering, while growing the ability to work effectively across both. For this role, experience or familiarity with processing large-scale transactional and financial data, using batch/streaming frameworks like Spark, Flink, or Beam (with Scala for data engineering), and building scalable backend systems in Java is a strong advantage.
* You possess a foundational understanding of system design, data structures, and algorithms, coupled with a strong desire to learn quickly, embrace feedback, and continuously improve your technical skills.
* You’re familiar with cloud-native development and deployment, ideally within the Google Cloud Platform.
* You think critically about system design and strive to build solutions that are reliable, maintainable, and auditable at scale.
* You have good communication skills and can articulate your ideas and ask clarifying questions.
* You love collaborating with others.
* You thrive in ambiguous and fast-changing environments, and know how to make progress even when requirements are evolving.
* You approach platform engineering with empathy for your users — prioritizing usability, configurability, and long-term sustainability.
* You care deeply about code quality, testing, and documentation, and you aim to build systems that are easy to understand and operate.
* You enjoy collaborating across functions and bring clarity and alignment when working with engineering, finance, and product partners.
* You’re naturally curious, self-motivated, and always looking for ways to grow your technical skills and improve how things are done.


**Duration:** 
 2025-12-08 to 2026-08-31
   

  

**Application deadline:** 
 2025-12-06
   

  

 Please apply directly through our system with:
   

  

* Your updated CV
* Availability to start the assignment


 In the motivation, describe why you are suitable for this assignment - refer to previous consulting assignments, employment, education and personal qualities.
   

  

**Please note:** 
 We do not accept any applications through mail. All applications have to be sent through the portal to be valid.
   

  

**Offer continuously:** 
 Please note that for this role we offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested, we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: C++ Developer
description:
HiQ samarbetar idag med teknikintensiva kunder i framkant som produktbolag inom industrin, försvar och autonoma fordon. Det kan handla om förarlösa tåg eller elektrifierade tunga lastbilar samt sensor och navigationssystem för både båtar och flyg. Vi är involverade i utvecklingen av både komponenterna i fordonen och de som finns vid sidan av dem. En del av projekten har en internationell omfattning med hög säkerhetsklassning.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som gillar att grotta ner dig i komplexa problem. Vi tror att det är bäst för helheten i projektet om du är trygg i din kompetens och har några års erfarenhet med dig in i rollen.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Högskole-/Civilingenjörsexamen inom datateknik, teknisk fysik, elektroteknik eller motsvarande.
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling inom C++.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
* Möjlighet att jobba på plats på kontoret 3-5 dagar i veckan.
* Erfarenhet eller intresse för industribranschen.


**Varför HiQ**
 Sedan 1995 har HiQ varit konsultbolaget som förenklat världen för både kunder och slutanvändare med hjälp av teknik, design och kommunikation. HiQ har alltid fokuserat på två saker: att ha kul på jobbet och att leverera lösningar utöver förväntningar - det är vad som driver oss framåt! Vi HiQare är stolta över att ha en kultur som präglas av
 **resultat** 
 ,
 **ansvar, enkelhet** 
 och
 **glädje** 
 . Vi tror på att arbeta tillsammans för att nå våra gemensamma mål och strävar efter att hjälpa varandra att fortsätta växa och utvecklas. Hos oss får du utöver chansen att utveckla din egen kompetens också möjlighet att lära, leda och inspirera dina kollegor.
   

  

*I denna rekrytering tillämpar vi löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan ansökningstiden har gått ut. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!*

title: AI Software Engineer/Platform Architect - BCG X
description:
**Locations** 
 : Stockholm | Copenhagen V | Berlin | München | London
   

  

 Who We Are
   

  

 Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.
   

  

 To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures—and business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.
   

  

**We Are BCG X**
 We’re a diverse team of more than 3,000 tech experts united by a drive to make a difference. Working across industries and disciplines, we combine our experience and expertise to tackle the biggest challenges faced by society today. We go beyond what was once thought possible, creating new and innovative solutions to the world’s most complex problems. Leveraging BCG’s global network and partnerships with leading organizations, BCG X provides a stable ecosystem for talent to build game-changing businesses, products, and services from the ground up, all while growing their career. Together, we strive to create solutions that will positively impact the lives of millions.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 Our BCG X teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, designing innovative algorithms, implementing, and deploying scalable solutions, and enabling colleagues and clients to fully embrace AI. Our product offerings span from fully custom-builds to industry specific leading edge AI software solutions.
   

  

 As a (Senior) AI Software Engineer you’ll be part of our rapidly growing engineering team and help to build the next generation of AI solutions. You’ll have the chance to partner with clients in a variety of BCG regions and industries, and on key topics like climate change, enabling them to design, build, and deploy new and innovative solutions. Additional responsibilities will include developing and delivering thought leadership in scientific communities and papers as well as leading conferences on behalf of BCG X.
   

  

 We Are Looking For Talented Individuals With a Passion For Software Development, Large-scale Data Analytics And Transforming Organizations Into AI Led Innovative Companies. Successful Candidates Possess The Following
   

  

* +4 years of experience in a technology consulting environment
* Apply software development practices and standards to develop robust and maintainable software
* Actively involved in every part of the software development life cycle
* Experienced at guiding non-technical teams and consultants in and best practices for robust software development
* Optimize and enhance computational efficiency of algorithms and software design
* Motivated by a fast-paced, service-oriented environment and interacting directly with clients on new features for future product releases
* Enjoy collaborating in teams to share software design and solution ideas
* A natural problem-solver and intellectually curious across a breadth of industries and topics
* Master's degree or PhD in relevant field of study - please provide all academic certificates showing the final grades (A-level, Bachelor, Master, PhD)


**Additional Tasks**
* Designing and building data & AI platforms for our clients.
* Such platforms provide data and (Gen)AI capabilities to a wide variety of consumers and use cases across the client organization.
* Often part of large (AI) transformational journeys BCG does for its clients.
* Often involves the following engineering disciplines:
+ Cloud Engineering
+ Data Engineering (not building pipelines but designing and building the framework)
+ DevOps
+ MLOps/LLMOps
+ ...

* Often work with the following technologies:
+ Azure, AWS, GCP
+ Airflow, dbt, Databricks, Snowflake, etc.
+ GitHub, Azure DevOps and related developer tooling and CI/CD platforms, Terraform or other Infra-as-Code
+ MLflow, AzureML or similar for MLOps; LangSmith, Langfuse and similar for LLMOps
+ ...


*The difference to our "AI Engineer" role is: Do you "use/consume" these technologies, or are you the one that "provides" them to the rest of the organization.*
 What You'll Bring
   

  

**Technologies**
 Programming Languages: Python
   

  

**Experience With Additional Programming Languages Is a Plus**
 Additional info
   

  

 BCG offers a comprehensive benefits program, including medical, dental and vision coverage, telemedicine services, life, accident and disability insurance, parental leave and family planning benefits, caregiving resources, mental health offerings, a generous retirement program, financial guidance, paid time off, and more.
   

  

 #BCGXjob
   

  

 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: IT utvecklare
description:
**Att jobba som IT utvecklare**
 Som utvecklare på Skandia är du en viktig del i vår digitala transformation där vi utvecklar hållbara lösningar för framtidens sparande, pension, bank och försäkring.
   

  

 Vi arbetar agilt på riktigt med hjälp av SAFe-ramverket i självstyrande team med stort mandat. Du blir en del av en teknisk miljö i framkant där vi rör oss mot en eventdriven arkitektur, molnet i Azure, CI/CD och Azure DevOps.
   

  

 Nu söker vi fler systemutvecklare som vill bidra, driva förändring och fortsätta utvecklas tillsammans med oss.
   

  

 Hos oss här på Skandia finns cirka 60 utvecklingsteam som arbetar i en Microsoft-baserad miljö.
   

  

**Vår Techstack Omfattar Bland Annat**
* .NET 9
* React (TypeScript)
* Molnlösningar i Azure
* Octopus Deploy
* Automatiserade tester och CI/CD


 Några exempel på vad du kommer att göra:
   

  

* Utveckla och förvalta verksamhetskritiska system
* Ta fram designlösningar tillsammans med teamet
* Utforska och implementera ny teknik
* Bygga och optimera integrationer mot andra system
* Bidra till en lärande och positiv teamkultur


 Våra IT-områden där vi söker systemutvecklare:
   

  

*IT Bank*
 Vi utvecklar system för våra bankkunder – allt från betalningar, kort och kontohantering till bolån, värdepapper, inloggning och säkerhet.
   

  

*IT Försäkring*
 Vi hanterar lösningar för våra försäkringskunder, bland annat inom Lumerasystemet, riskbedömning, kundportaler för individ och företag samt tjänste-, grupp-, vård- och hälsoförsäkring.
   

  

*IT Affärsgemensamt*
 Vi bygger system som används av alla våra kunder – både bank och försäkring – till exempel backend- och frontendkomponenter till skandia.se och mobilappen, kundkännedom, dokumenthantering och kundkommunikation.
   

  

 Vi arbetar hybrid vilket innebär arbete på kontoret varvat med distansarbete. I rollen kommer du att rapportera till närmaste gruppchef IT.
   

  

*Just nu söker vi en fullstackutvecklare till Stefan Ravelius team inom IT Bank samt en senior .NET utvecklare till Gunnar Bedmans team inom IT Affärsgemensamt.*
**För att lyckas i rollen**
 Vi söker dig som är nyfiken, målmedveten och samarbetsinriktad. Du har en vilja att dela kunskap, utvecklas både som individ och tillsammans med andra. Du trivs i dialog med både kollegor och verksamheten, och ser värdet i att skapa lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad för våra kunder.
   

  

 Vi ser att du har några års dokumenterad erfarenhet av systemutveckling, där det är en fördel om du arbetat med backend tekniker som .NET/ C# samt frontend teknikerna React och Typescript. Ett grundkrav för rollen är att du behärskar svenska flytande, både i tal och skrift. Meriterande för rollen är om du tidigare arbetat inom bank-, finans-, eller försäkringsbranschen.
   

  

 Vi har dessutom påbörjat vår resa med GitHub Copilot och ser det som en självklarhet att du vill ligga i framkant inom AI-stödd systemutveckling.
   

  

**Din utveckling på Skandia**
 Hos Skandia får du möjlighet att kunna växa. Många av våra systemutvecklare har gått vidare internt till roller som mjukvaruarkitekt, lösningsarkitekt, tågarkitekt eller inom ledarskap som Scrum Master, Product Owner eller gruppchef.
   

  

 Vi är ett precis lagom stort bolag. Vad vi menar är att vi har en tillräckligt bred verksamhet för att du ska hitta vägar att utvecklas och lära nytt, men samtidigt är vi inte större än att du kan påverka och känna samhörighet. Hos oss försvinner du inte i mängden och har alla möjligheter att hitta arbetssätt som utmanar och motiverar.
   

  

 Med över 400 systemutvecklare finns det mycket erfarenhet och nyfikenhet där vi arbetar för att sprida kompetens mellan medarbetare.
   

  

**Vad händer nu?**
 Vi jobbar med löpande urval så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag. I ansökan kommer vi att ställa ett antal urvalsfrågor som ligger till grund för första urvalet. För att göra rekryteringsprocessen så rättvis och objektiv som möjligt kommer det att ingå intervjuer, tester, bakgrundskontroll samt digital referenstagning.
   

  

 Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning för denna roll.
   

  

 Om du har frågor kopplat till rollen eller rekryteringsprocess, vänligen ta kontakt med Talent Acquisition Partner Harald Brehmer på harald.brehmer@skandia.se.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Mer om IT**
 Vi på Skandia IT är stolta över att vara en kundorienterad enhet som levererar effektiva och säkra lösningar för våra kunder. Med cirka 600 engagerade medarbetare är vi mitt i en spännande transformationsresa, där vi utvecklas tillsammans och har kul på vägen. Framåt tillsammans är vårt motto!
   

  

 Vi arbetar agilt och har sedan 2017 använt oss av SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) ramverket, där leverans och kundvärde alltid står i centrum. Våra tågledningar och team, jobbar verksamhetsbaserat med aktiviteter som sprintplanering, daily stand-ups, team-synk, code reviews och retrospektiv.
   

  

 Var 12:e vecka samlas vi alla i vår ljusa och inspirerande Ljusgård på kontoret i Stockholm för 2 planeringsdagar. Planeringsperioden består av 6 tvåveckorssprintar, där den sista sprinten är en innovationssprint. Här får du chansen att, själv eller tillsammans med ditt team, utveckla och förfina våra system.

title: Utvecklare inom AI, Machine Learning och bildbehandling
description:
**Developer Machine Learning/AI – BitSimNOW** 

*Join a cutting-edge technology company developing advanced solutions for medical technology, defense, and industrial applications. We use both classical image processing methods and machine learning techniques.* 




  





**We are looking for a passionate and driven developer within Machine Learning, AI and image processing** 
 to join our team at BitSim NOW. In this role, you will be involved in a wide range of development projects, working closely with customers to create innovative solutions at the forefront of technology. You will also occasionally support our sales team as a technical expert. This is an opportunity to work hands-on with technical programming and image processing, contributing to everything from feasibility studies and system design to implementation and testing. Depending on your background and interests, you may work as a developer, system architect, or even team lead in different projects.
 



  





**What you will do** 



* Analyze customer challenges and propose effective technical solutions
* Develop advanced image processing algorithms
* Build complete industrial image processing systems
* Integrate line-scan cameras, IR cameras, and standard industrial cameras
* Create concepts for new systems and implement them on-site with customers
* Work in small, collaborative in-house teams that give you a holistic view of the project and business



 Our projects span a wide range of industries and technical domains, offering great variation and opportunities for professional growth.
 



  





**Who you are** 




 You have a Master’s degree in Computer Engineering, Media Technology, or a similar field, and at least five years of qualified experience in image processing development. You are self-motivated, technically curious, and enjoy taking initiative.
 



  





**You bring:** 



* Formal education within image processing
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Experience with Python, C#, C++, and MATLAB
* Proficiency in both Swedish and English
* Experience with Windows and Linux environments
* Familiarity with terminal-based workflows and shell scripting (Bash/PowerShell)
* Experience working with Git and an understanding of test-driven development



  





**Meriting experience** 




 It is highly advantageous if you also have experience with:
 


* Machine learning and AI-based solutions
* Embedded systems development
* Cloud-based AI platforms such as Google Cloud or Microsoft Azure
* End-to-end system solutions involving computers, software, electronics, and measurement technology
* Implementing classical image processing methods using tools like Python, MATLAB, or ImageJ
* Applying Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) to image processing problems
* Transfer Learning using Keras, PyTorch, or NVIDIA Transfer Learning Toolkit



  





**Join our team – where you come first! 🌟** 




 We are a group of 40+ engineers with diverse expertise, experience, and skills. Here, you’ll find a place to grow, experiment, and thrive! We value innovation, community, and a non-hierarchical culture where everyone can be themselves. Naturally, we uphold strong values and provide a work environment where you feel appreciated.
 



  





**What we offer:** 




 ✅ Learning from experienced colleagues
 



 📚 Further education & development opportunities
 



 🔬 Own lab with 3D printers & development tools
 



 💡 Space for your ideas & projects
 



 🙌 A non-hierarchical culture – be yourself!
 



 🖥️ We love nerds and are still woke!
 



 📹 Love blogging/vlogging? We need your help!
 



  





 At BitSimNOW, our employees are our top priority. We strive to create a workplace where you can enjoy a healthy balance of work, fun, and free time. With us, you get flexibility and benefits that truly make a difference in your daily life, such as:
 



  





 ✅ Collective agreement (Almega TechSverige 2023–2025)
 



 💼 ITP occupational pension
 



 📈 Flexible pension
 



 💪 Wellness allowance
 



 🎿 Ski trips, conferences & excursions
 



 🍻 Afterworks & our own microbrewery
 



 🏌️‍♂️ Groups for padel, golf, floorball, etc.
 



  





**…and much more. Join our team! 🚀**

title: Stim erbjuder LIA som React-utvecklare under våren 2026
description:
*Stim är en medlemsorganisation utan vinstintresse för 100 000 anslutna musikskapare och förlag. Vi arbetar för en stark upphovsrätt och för att låtskrivare och kompositörer ska få betalt för sin musik. Tillsammans med våra medlemmar ger vi förutsättningar för skapande och återväxt i Sveriges musikliv.*
 Stims teknikteam består för närvarande av cirka 40 personer, uppdelade i flera produktteam. Vi utvecklar mjukvara och tjänster till över 100 000 anslutna medlemmar och kunder. Varje år bearbetar vi data för att kunna betala ut omkring 3 miljarder till våra musikskapare.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som LIA-student hos oss kommer du att arbeta tillsammans med erfarna utvecklare i ett av våra utvecklingsteam. Du får möjlighet att:
   

  

* Arbeta med TypeScript i ramverket React
* Delta i utvecklingen av våra digitala tjänster
* Få insyn i agila arbetsmetoder och moderna utvecklingsprocesser


 Under din LIA-period får du inte bara praktisk erfarenhet, du blir en del av ett team som brinner för innovation och lärande. Med stöd av en dedikerad handledare från våra seniora utvecklare får du verktygen och självförtroendet att växa som utvecklare.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som:**
* Studerar programmering med inriktning mot frontend
* Har en LIA-period på minst 10 veckor (gärna längre)
* Är nyfiken, engagerad och gärna delar vårt syfte: att skapa värde för musikskapare och främja musikens betydelse i samhället


 Hos oss får du arbeta i en organisation med ett viktigt uppdrag och en kultur som präglas av samarbete, innovation och passion för musik. Din LIA hos oss är en chans att utvecklas, lära och skapa värdefulla kontakter i branschen. Även om LIA-perioden hos oss inte garanterar en anställning, ger den dig erfarenhet och möjligheter som kan bli ett viktigt steg mot din framtida karriär.
   

  

**Intresserad?**
 Är du intresserad av att göra din LIA hos oss? Välkommen in med ditt CV så vi får en bild av din bakgrund och erfarenhet. Berätta också kort varför du tror att vi är en bra match för dig! Vi tar emot ansökningar löpande och anpassar start- och slutdatum utefter din LIA-period.

title: iOS-utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Hela appen ska skrivas om från scratch.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Du ska vara mycket senior i swift (6) och ha koll på swiftdata och swiftUI.
* Du är duktig på arkitektur och UI och har jobbat med firebase.
* Ett intresse av ML är meriterande men inte avgörande. Viktigast är att du är driftig och tycker om att koda!


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 03-12-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Apputvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Har djup erfarenhet av både iOS (Swift/SwiftUI) och Android (Kotlin/Jetpack Compose).
* Har byggt flera appar från grunden till lansering och underhåll.
* Är trygg med att skapa arkitektur, navigationsstruktur, datasynk, caching, pushnotiser och app-releaseprocesser.
* Kan ta ägarskap över appen och säkerställa att allt fungerar som det ska, även vid hög belastning.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 03-12-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
