title: Senior Digital Art Director / Web Experience Designer
description:
Bou is a new-school Nordic brand company that builds brands in various domains; including design, marketing, development and communications. We believe that ideal teams are built with a diverse range of experiences and to support this, we have created a freelancer platform Bou &CO that enables us to collaborate closely with freelance creatives, actively connecting proficient freelancers with engaging clients.
  

  

We are currently looking to add more creative talent into our network of future-ready designers on Bou & Co. We’re seeking a **Senior Art Director / Digital Designer** who blends high-end brand aesthetics with cutting-edge website design, modern visual systems, and a strong grasp of emerging tech.

### **What You’ll Do**

* Lead conceptual development for digital-first brand and marketing initiatives, bringing fresh, modern, innovative ideas to the table.
* Design visually stunning website experiences, including UX/UI layouts, component systems, and design directions aligned with modern web standards.
* Create high-impact visual assets across campaigns, brand systems, and product storytelling.
* Bring forward-thinking design to B2B and tech-oriented clients, translating complex ideas into elegant, inspiring visuals.

**Requirements**

### **What We’re Looking For**

* **5+ years of experience** as an Art Director, Digital Designer, or similar creative role.
* A **modern, elevated portfolio** demonstrating exceptional website design, digital brand systems, and campaign concepts.
* Experience working with **SaaS, B2B, finance, or technology brands**.
* Strong understanding of web design principles, UI/UX best practices, and how creativity meets technology.
* A collaborative communicator who loves exploring ideas, challenging the status quo, and pushing creativity forward.

**Benefits**


Applications  

  

If you’re a skilled Art Director / Designer looking for new freelance opportunities, we’d love to hear from you!
  

  

Please note, we can only consider candidates who have submitted their profile to our freelancer platform, so be sure to complete your profile there.

  

https://freelancers.bou.co/


If your profile matches what we are looking for, we will be in contact you via email with a more comprehensive brief of the project, and additionally you can be considered for other upcoming freelancer projects as well.

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description:
Were looking for a Senior Full Stack Engineer
  
Join us in transforming the digital signage landscape. PLAYipp, the leading Nordic digital signage company, is seeking a Senior Full Stack Engineer.
  
About PLAYippAt PLAYipp, we deliver comprehensive, user-friendly digital signage solutions that empower businesses to communicate effectively and innovate. Our platform enables organizations of all sizes to manage and showcase content seamlessly across various screens, enhancing communication and customer engagement.
  
Key role descriptionAs a Senior Full Stack Developer at PLAYipp, you are a key technical contributor responsible for architecting, building, and maintaining our market-leading Content Management System for digital signage. You combine technical expertise with seniority to deliver solutions, drive innovation, and ensure code quality.
  
Your work directly impacts tens of thousands of users globally.
  
What we expect from youArchitecture & Development
  
Design and implement scalable, maintainable solutions using TypeScript, React, and Node.js
  
Participate in innovative AI/data engineering in development operations, interface, and tech stack.
  
Build full-stack features from the database layer through to the user interface.
  
Participate in architectural decisions for new features and system improvements.
  
Ensure performance, security, and reliability across the platform.
  
  

Team Collaboration
  
Lead by example in code quality, communication, and professionalism.
  
Share knowledge through documentation and workshops.
  
Help team members grow their technical skills and career development.
  
Foster a collaborative, learning-oriented team culture.
  
  

Technical Leadership
  
Advocate for best practices in software development.
  
Help establish and refine team processes and workflows.
  
Contribute an expert perspective during architecture and design reviews.
  
  

Cross-Functional Partnership
  
Work closely with the Product team to understand requirements and provide technical input
  
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to implement exceptional user experiences
  
Work with the QA team to ensure comprehensive testing and quality
  
Participate in customer feedback sessions to understand user needs
  
  

System Evolution
  
Balance feature development with technical improvements
  
Plan and execute architectural refactoring when needed
  
Ensure scalability for international expansion
  
Required CompetenciesTechnical Skills 5+ years of professional experience in full-stack development, with demonstrated progression in technical complexity and responsibility.
  
Strong expertise in TypeScript, React, and Node.js with a proven track record of delivering production applications.
  
Deep understanding of modern web application architecture, including RESTful APIs
  
Proficient with relational databases (MySQL or similar), including schema design, query optimization, and data modeling.
  
Proven ability to work in Agile/Scrum environments.
  
  

Continuous Development
  
Stay very current with the JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem.
  
Deepen knowledge of system architecture and design patterns.
  
Expand expertise in performance optimization.
  
Learn emerging technologies relevant to our stack.
  
Location & Schedule Primarily based at Playipp HQ in central Gävle.
  
Hybrid work arrangement with remote flexibility as agreed on.
  
Core collaboration hours for team synchronization.
  
Flexibility for focused work and personal needs.
  
Success in This Role
  
You'll be successful as a Senior Full Stack Developer at PLAYipp if you:
  
Consistently deliver high-quality, maintainable code that moves the product forward.
  
Engage in innovative development using data and AI technologies.
  
Collaborate effectively with Product, Design, and QA to deliver exceptional user experiences.
  
Take ownership of complex problems and see them through to resolution
  
Contribute positively to team culture and processes.
  
Stay curious and continuously improve your skills and knowledge.
  
Why Join PLAYipp? Work with a talented and enthusiastic team in an innovative and growing company.
  
Enjoy a dynamic and collaborative work environment that values creativity and initiative.
  
Opportunity to make a significant impact on the digital signage industry.
  
Competitive salary and benefits package.
  
  

If you’re ready to take your career to the next level and help shape the future of digital signage at PLAYipp, apply today.
  
We look forward to welcoming the next key player to our team at PLAYipp!

title: Idé till digital lösning
description:
**Utmaning & mål**  

När en ny strålskyddslag trädde i kraft innebar det att betydligt fler verksamheter – som tandläkare, veterinärer och arbetsplatser med radon – omfattades av anmälningsplikt. Strålsäkerhetsmyndighetens dåvarande, manuella process med posthantering var inte längre hållbar. Myndigheten behövde en digital lösning som kunde lanseras i tid för att uppfylla det nya lagkravet – med krav på säkerhet, skalbarhet och användarvänlighet.


**Lösning**  

Agero satte samman ett erfaret team med arkitekt, utvecklare och UX-designer som kunde arbeta effektivt från dag ett. Lösningen som togs fram omfattade både ett gränssnitt för verksamheter som skulle göra anmälningar och ett verktyg för myndighetens handläggare att hantera dem. Systemet integrerades med bland annat BankID för säker inloggning och möjliggjorde fakturering direkt i samband med anmälan.



Arbetet bedrevs agilt i tvåveckorssprintar med löpande demos och prioriteringar tillsammans med kunden, vilket gjorde att teamet kunde hålla ett högt tempo utan att tumma på kvaliteten.


**Resultat**  

Efter fem månader var systemet i drift – lagkravet var uppfyllt, och myndigheten hade ett hållbart och förvaltningsbart system på plats. Användarupplevelsen förbättrades markant, både för de verksamheter som gör anmälningar och för de handläggare som behandlar dem.



***”Att projektet skulle gå i mål och bli så här bra var inget vi vågade hoppas på. Det enda tråkiga är att vi inte får fortsätta jobba med teamet från Agero.”***



– Melina Assadpur, Projektledare, Strålsäkerhetsmyndigheten
company_description: Our mission is to transform the driving experience through an unmatched combination of innovative technology and human-powered solutions.

title: Consultant Opportunity: Senior UX Designer
description:
Göteborg, Sweden | On-site  

Assignment period: 1 Jan 2026 – 31 May 2026  

English required | Swedish meritorious  

Please submit your CV in English


We are looking for an experienced Senior UX Designer / Design Lead who thrives in a hands-on, strategic role and enjoys shaping mature, user-centric digital experiences. You will work closely with a product team in Gothenburg and collaborate daily with cross-functional stakeholders to elevate UX across a customer support platform.


### **About the role**


You will work broadly across interaction design, visual design and UX research, while driving UX strategy and mentoring designers. The assignment includes leading UX activities end-to-end and partnering with a Service Design Lead to develop concepts and prototypes. You will play a key role in raising the UX maturity of digital platforms and ensuring cohesive experiences across devices and touchpoints.


### **Your responsibilities**


Lead and orchestrate UX activities across the full design process
  

Work closely with product managers, product owners, developers and other stakeholders  

Communicate design concepts and rationale clearly to technical and non-technical audiences  

Translate user needs into wireframes and prototypes of varying fidelity  

Plan and conduct user interviews, usability testing and workshops  

Monitor and improve usability performance across digital platforms  

Design experiences for multiple devices and environments  

Contribute to agile ways of working within fast-paced, iterative development cycles  

Provide leadership, coaching and skills development for team members

### **Who you are**


An accomplished designer with a strong passion for user-centric problem-solving  

Skilled at driving business value through design and collaborating across disciplines  

Comfortable taking a lead role in concept creation with a Service Design Lead  

Able to balance strategic thinking with hands-on design execution


### **Qualifications**


Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Human-Computer Interaction, Design or similar  

10+ years of experience in UX/UI design with experience leading design teams  

Strong understanding of user-centered design principles  

Experience working in agile product teams and with developers  

Proficiency in Figma, Sketch or Adobe Creative Suite  

English required; Swedish is a plus


Sway Sourcing is an innovative recruitment partner specializing in matching the right talent with the right company—quickly and efficiently. Our primary focus lies in Finance, Administration, HR, Marketing, and IT, but we also have the broad expertise and flexibility required to deliver tailored recruitment solutions across all industries.


Although we are a relatively new player, we have already gained the trust of many of Sweden's largest companies and operate both nationally and internationally. With bases in Sweden and Spain, we offer a unique combination of local expertise and global reach. Our strong network and deep industry insights make us the obvious partner for companies looking to stay ahead in their recruitment efforts.

title: Lösningsarkitekt
description:
**Rollbeskrivning**  

Vi söker en erfaren Lösningsarkitekt till ett uppdrag inom butikssystem, där fokus ligger på att digitalisera arbetet i fysiska butiker genom moderna webb- och mobilbaserade lösningar. I rollen ansvarar du för den övergripande lösningsarkitekturen och samverkar nära produktägare, utvecklingsteam och andra arkitekter i en modern molnmiljö.

### **Arbetsuppgifter**

* Definiera och vidareutveckla lösningsarkitektur för butiksvända applikationer.
* Säkerställa hållbara integrationsmönster och robusta kopplingar mot backendplattformar (exempelvis SAP S4).
* Översätta verksamhetsbehov till skalbara, säkra och kostnadseffektiva tekniska lösningar.
* Bidra i kravarbete, teknisk dokumentation och arkitekturbeskrivningar.
* Säkerställa att lösningar följer relevanta säkerhets- och lagkrav.
* Arbeta tvärfunktionellt med flera team och hantera beroenden mellan system och domäner.
* Vara teknisk rådgivare inom molnarkitektur, integration och moderna webb-/mobiltekniker.

### **Krav**

* Minst 6 års erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt.
* Erfarenhet av att designa lösningar för webb- och/eller mobila applikationer.
* Erfarenhet av integration mot större enterprise-system (SAP S4/CAR är meriterande).
* God förståelse för API-design och moderna integrationsmönster.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i miljöer med flera team och beroenden.
* Dokumenterad förmåga att omsätta verksamhetskrav till robusta tekniska lösningar.
* Erfarenhet av butiksvända retail-applikationer.
* Erfarenhet av molnplattformar, gärna Azure.
* Kunskap om moderna webb-/mobiltekniker, t.ex. React, React Native, Java och headless CMS.
* Erfarenhet av integration och eventdriven arkitektur (t.ex. Kafka, EventHub, REST/ODATA).
* Kännedom om mikrotjänster och API Management.
* Erfarenhet av IAM-lösningar (t.ex. Microsoft Entra ID / Active Directory).
* Erfarenhet av databaser och sökteknologier, t.ex. PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch och Cosmos DB.

### **Meriterande**

* Erfarenhet från retailbranschen och större digitaliseringsprogram.
* Certifieringar inom arkitektur, t.ex. SAFe eller TOGAF.
* Erfarenhet av designsystem, komponentbibliotek eller UX-orienterad arkitektur.
* Kunskap om CI/CD, DevOps och Infrastructure as Code.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i agila organisationer med tvärfunktionella team.

### **Start / Längd**

* **Start:** Omgående
* **Längd:** Till 2026-06-30

### **Plats**

* **Plats:** Stockholm (hybrid, 3 dagar/vecka på plats)

### **Om Rasulson Consulting**


Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med både etablerade teknikbolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda attraktiva karriärmöjligheter för dig som vill utvecklas inom digitalisering och IT. Genom vår djupa tekniska kompetens och vårt omfattande nätverk matchar vi rätt konsult med rätt uppdrag – snabbt och träffsäkert. Hos oss får du personlig rådgivning, kontinuerlig återkoppling och möjlighet att ta nästa steg i din karriär.

title: UX-designer
description:
Vi söker en UX-designer till en myndighet inom trafik.


Detta är ett konsultuppdrag. Stationeringsort är Stockholm.


Tjänsten är på heltid.


Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.

**Uppdraget**


Rollen innebär att leda och driva designprocessen för en beställnings- och avtalswebbportal som utgör en central del av ett nytt trafikhanteringssystem. Som UX-designer ansvarar du för användarupplevelsen och säkerställer att lösningen uppfyller identifierade användarbehov genom ett användarcentrerat arbetssätt. Du arbetar nära både externa och interna målgrupper, identifierar behov och kontext, tar fram koncept, UX-flöden och validerad design samt prioriterar funktionalitet utifrån verksamhetens och användarnas krav. Rollen kräver att du är metodstark, självgående och trygg i hela designprocessen i en komplex och tvärfunktionell miljö.

 **Arbetsuppgifter**


Ansvara för användarupplevelsen i beställnings- och avtalswebbportalen.


Identifiera målgruppernas behov och kontext och utveckla målgruppsanpassade lösningar.


Leda och driva designprocessen från användarinsikt till koncept, UX-flöden och validerad design.


Prioritera funktionalitet utifrån användarnas och verksamhetens behov och bedöma vad som är kritiskt vid lansering.


Bedriva användarresearch och genomföra användningstester samt sammanställa och presentera resultat.


Ta fram lösningsskisser och prototyper i Figma på både konceptuell och detaljerad nivå.


Beskriva användarbehov på ett sätt som är praktiskt användbart för andra designers och utvecklare.


Designa system för yrkesanvändare med fokus på effektiva arbetsflöden och gränssnitt som stödjer arbetsprocesser.

 **Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**


Flytande svenska i tal och skrift.


Minst sex (6) års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av UX-design på heltid de senaste 10 åren.  

  

Minst tre (3) års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av UI-design på heltid, inom de senaste 6 åren.  

  

Dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta metoddrivet med användarcentrerad design i alla delar av designprocessen, styrkt av minst två (2) uppdrag/projekt där olika metoder använts, med minst ett (1) års varaktighet, från de senaste tio (10) åren. Erfarenheten ska inkludera tillämpning av etablerade UX-/UI-metoder såsom användarresor, intervjuer, prototyping, användartester eller liknande.  

  

Dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av att självständigt planera och genomföra en hel designprocess, inklusive att välja relevanta metoder, anpassa aktiviteter efter förutsättningar, och involvera relevanta roller och intressenter vid rätt tillfällen. Detta ska styrkas med minst två (2) uppdrag/projekt från de senaste tio (10) åren, där hela designprocessen genomförts inom ramen för ett och samma uppdrag/projekt.  

  

Dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av att ta fram, gestalta och kommunicera användarinsikter, från minst tre (3) uppdrag/projekt.  

  

Dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av att prioritera funktionalitet i en lösning, med hjälp av designmetodik och användarcentrerat arbetssätt, från minst tre (3) uppdrag/projekt.  

  

Dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av att utifrån kundinsikter gestalta flera olika lösningar parallellt på konceptuell nivå, och utvärdera dessa utifrån ett verksamhets- och användarperspektiv, från minst tre (3) uppdrag/projekt.  

  

Minst två (2) års arbetslivserfarenhet av designarbete i ett agilt tvärfunktionellt utvecklingsteam.  

  

Minst två (2) års arbetslivserfarenhet där konsult har erfarenhet av att ta fram designskisser och interaktiva prototyper i grafiska designverktyget Figma, som har utvärderats tillsammans med slutanvändare.

**Meriterande**

Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att omvandla användarbehov till strukturerade funktionella och icke-funktionella krav i minst ett (1) uppdrag.  

  

Dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha ansvarat för och utfört designarbetet för arbetsverktyg.  

  

Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att att genomföra uppdrag för offentlig sektor i minst ett (1) uppdrag med minst ett (1) års varaktighet.

**Personliga egenskaper**  

  

Metodstark inom design och kundcentrerat arbetssätt.  

  

Van att ta fram skisser och prototyper att utvärdera med kund och verksamhet, samt leverera som underlag till utvecklare.
  

  

Ödmjuk lagspelare som söker samarbete och samverkan, bra på att ta och ge feedback.
  

  

Van vid att arbeta med agil metodik och samverka tvärfunktionellt med andra roller i ett utvecklingsteam.  

  

Fokus på att leverera kund- och verksamhetsnytta snarare än features.
  

  

Intresserad av att bygga och stärka kundcentrerad designförmåga i grupp/team.





**Om oss**


Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.


Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.


Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.


För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.


Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.

**Vänligen skicka ditt CV på svenska.**

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Praktik - Products Data Analyst Student
description:
**Hej!**


**Är du nyfiken på dataanalys, AI, teknik** och hur vi kan förbättra lärandeupplevelser med smarta arbetsflöden? **Element** Logic öppnar nu för intresseanmälan till **praktik** eller LIA under vårterminen 2026 – och kanske är det just dig vi söker!


Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i ett **internationellt teknikföretag** som är ledande inom **automatiserade lagerlösningar och robotteknologi**. Vi samarbetar gärna med engagerade studenter och ser det som ett privilegium att bidra till din professionella utveckling genom en meningsfull period av lärande och praktisk erfarenhet.


Vi vet att det kan vara svårt att hitta rätt plats – och att många aldrig får ett svar. Det vill vi ändra på. Alla kan inte få en plats, men alla ska få sin ansökan behandlad med respekt och återkoppling.


**Om rollen och teamet**


Du blir en del av vårt **Products** Training Team, som ansvarar för att utveckla och leverera utbildning om **Element** Logics programvaror och robotprodukter till kunder och medarbetare över hela världen.


Som **Products Data** Analyst Student Intern kommer du att arbeta nära produktägare, analytiker, UX-designers, utvecklare och ämnesexperter för att säkerställa att våra utbildningsprogram håller hög kvalitet, är relevanta och bygger på aktuella data.


Din huvudsakliga uppgift blir att hjälpa teamet med datainsamling, analys och automatisering genom att skapa och använda AI-agenter och smarta arbetsflöden. Du kommer att bidra både till att förbättra våra utbildningsmaterial och – om tiden tillåter – stötta **Product Operations-teamet** med ekonomiska analyser och marknadsinsikter.  



  

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**


**Inom Products** Training:


* Samla in data från product release notes och produktdokumentation
* Identifiera vilka nyheter som påverkar utbildningsinnehållet
* Skapa rapporter som hjälper designers att uppdatera och förbättra våra kurser
* Analysera tester, enkäter och användarbeteende i vår utbildningsportal
* Bedöma utbildningens effektivitet och föreslå förbättringar
* Sammanställa UX-data och användarfeedback för att förbättra användarupplevelsen

**Inom Product Operations (vid tid och intresse):**


* Bidra till budgetering, forecasting och månadsrapporter
* Analysera cash flow och produktprissättning
* Göra konkurrent- och marknadsanalyser
* Använda och utveckla AI-stöd för analys och automatisering

**Vem är du?**


Vi söker dig som vill göra praktik ellerLIA som en del av din utbildning.
  

D studerar vid universitet, högskola eller yrkeshögskola – gärna inom ett område kopplat till data, analys, ekonomi, UX, teknik eller digitalt lärande – och praktiken är en obligatorisk del av din utbildning och är scemalagd för våren 2026.  



  

**Vi tror att du**:


* Studerar Data Analytics, Business Administration, Business Economics, UX Research, Informatik, Media & Kommunikation, Computer Science eller ett liknande område
* Har god förståelse för grundläggande dataanalys
* Är analytisk, strukturerad och noggrann
* Har lätt för att förstå tekniska koncept och förklara dem för andra
* Trivs med att arbeta både självständigt och i team
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i engelska (skrift och tal)
* Är nyfiken, användarcentrerad och gillar att lösa problem

**Meriterande** om du har erfarenhet av:


* Excel, Power BI eller andra analystools
* Kvalitativ och kvantitativ analys
* Att tolka tekniska dokument och release notes
* Hypotesformulering och action planning

AI-verktyg eller automatisering  

* 

  

**Om Element** Logic


Element Logic är Europas ledande leverantör av automatiserade lagerlösningar. Vi utvecklar både fysiska och digitala produkter som hjälper företag världen över att optimera sina logistikflöden.
  

Vår kultur präglas av samarbete, nyfikenhet och en stark vilja att skapa smarta lösningar – alltid med människan i fokus.  



  

**Praktisk information**


**Period:** Våren 2026 (heltid eller deltid)
  

**Plats:** Huvudsakligen på vårt kontor i Lund, med möjlighet till hybridarbete
  

**Ersättning:** Praktiken är obetald och genomförs som en del av din utbildning  



  

Du behöver vara **över 18 år**. Vara inskriven vid universitet, högskola eller yrkeshögskola och omfattas av skolans försäkring


**Du behöver inte bifoga ett CV** – lägg hellre tid på att berätta **vem du är, vad du studerar och varför du vill göra din praktik hos oss. Om du har en portfolio eller tidigare projekt får du gärna bifoga dem.**  



  

Vi går igenom alla ansökningar och intervjuar löpande.


För ytterligare frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta


**Lene Berg,** lene.berg@elementlogic.net.

 **Be yourself, in your element**


At Element Logic, our people are our greatest resource. We believe individuals should be in their element and we recognize, celebrate, and nurture the strength of diversity. We offer equal opportunities and welcome applicants regardless of age, race, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, language, national origin, mental and physical abilities, religious and political affiliations, stage of life, or family circumstances. We desire a work environment where people flourish with their unique abilities, perspectives, and life experiences.


**About Element Logic**


Element Logic is a technology company that optimizes warehouses for customers to gain a competitive edge. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Norway. It operates worldwide and is the world’s first and largest AutoStore-partner. Element Logic offers its customers automated robotic solutions, software, and consulting services.


Total revenue for 2023 was EUR 471 million.


For more information go to elementlogic.net and follow us on LinkedIn, Facebook and Youtube.

title: Senior UX Designer / UX Design Lead
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Har minst 12 års erfarenhet inom UX/UI-design, med dokumenterad erfarenhet av strategiskt UX-arbete och ledarskap.
* Har erfarenhet av att driva och coacha designteam eller mentorera designers.
* Har djup förståelse för användarcentrerad design, design thinking och beprövade UX-metoder.
* Är van vid att designa och utveckla användarupplevelser för flera enheter och touchpoints.
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta i agila team och med iterativ produktutveckling.
* Är skicklig på att kommunicera, samarbeta och presentera designlösningar på ett tydligt sätt för olika målgrupper.
* Har erfarenhet av att använda verktyg som Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite eller motsvarande.
* Har relevant högskoleutbildning inom HCI, Design eller liknande område.

 **Sista ansökningdatum:** 03-12-2025

 **Om Oss**  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Software Engineer - Fullstack
description:
*Vill du vara med och skapa framtidens digitala bankupplevelse – i hela stacken – tillsammans med andra som brinner för teknik och samhällsnytta?*


Vi söker fler engagerade utvecklare som vill vara med och forma nästa generations digitala tjänster för sparande, investeringar och bank. Hos oss kombineras teknikintresse med samhällsengagemang – i team där gemenskap, samarbete och inkludering är en självklar del av vardagen. Vi tror på ett arbetsliv där det går att vara både ambitiös och mänsklig, där balans och meningsfullhet är lika viktiga som innovation.


Teknisk skicklighet är förstås viktigt – men hos oss är det lika avgörande att du tycker om att samarbeta, dela kunskap och bidra till en öppen och omtänksam teamkultur.  

  

**Om rollen**  

Som Fullstackutvecklare hos oss arbetar du i ett agilt och självstyrande team med stort ansvar – från idé till produktion. Du tar ägarskap över dina lösningar i hela ledet och bidrar med både frontendutveckling i Angular och robust backend-arkitektur i Java.


Du får jobba med modern Java, mikrotjänstarkitektur och avancerade frontendlösningar i en miljö där vi hela tiden lär av varandra, testar nytt och strävar efter att göra skillnad för riktiga användare. I rollen ligger flera viktiga uppgifter som att:

  

* Designa, utveckla och vidareutveckla moderna web-appar inom teamets domän
* Ta helhetsansvar för din kodbas i både frontend (Angular) och backend (Java)
* Delta i tekniska designprocesser och ta fram beslutsunderlag
* Säkerställa att frontend byggs enligt Avanzas best practices och UX-riktlinjer
* Bidra aktivt i teamets planering, samarbeten och kontinuerliga förbättringsarbete
* Automatisera och optimera affärsflöden i nära samarbete med teamet, Product Managers och verksamheten

**Så här jobbar vi**


Vi är ca 35 autonoma utvecklingsteam som har fullt ägarskap över sin produkt, sin roadmap och sina tekniska val. Vi arbetar datadrivet och iterativt, med fokus på att skapa verkligt värde för användarna och samtidigt bevara en hållbar utvecklingstakt.


Parprogrammering och mobbprogrammering är en naturlig del av vår vardag, liksom gemensam design och kodgranskning. Lärande sker tillsammans, genom stöd och nyfikenhet – och vi firar våra framsteg, stora som små.  

  

**Vi tror att du**

* Har några års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet som Fullstackutvecklare
* Är bevandrad inom både frontend (Angular eller React), och backend (Java)
* Kan bygga och underhålla webbapplikationer i produktion
* Stark kompetens i HTML, CSS, JavaScript
* Skriver välstrukturerad, testbar och skalbar kod
* Är nyfiken, kommunikativ och trivs med att arbeta tillsammans med andra
* Har ett helhetstänk och vill bidra till både teamets och produktens utveckling
* Gillar en kultur där det är okej att fråga, dela, misslyckas och växa


Har du också erfarenhet från techbolag, bank eller finans är det såklart meriterande. Även UX-erfarenhet eller samarbete med designers.

 **En kultur för gemenskap och hållbarhet**


Vi tror att de bästa resultaten uppstår i trygga team där alla får komma till tals. Därför lägger vi stor vikt vid samarbete, öppenhet och arbetsglädje. Vi strävar efter jämställda team där alla känner sig trygga att vara sig själva och bidra med sin unika kompetens. Hos oss får du utrymme att utvecklas i din egen takt och kombinera arbetet med ett hållbart liv.

 **Ansökan**  

Skicka din ansökan genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök” nedan. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, sista dag för ansökan är den **20/12.**


Välkommen med din ansökan!

*Erbjudanden från rekryteringsföretag/annonssäljare undanbedes.*
company_description: Med visionen om att skapa en bättre framtid för miljoner människor går vi till jobbet för att skapa billigare, bättre och enklare produkter och tjänster för våra kunder!

title: Product Designer - H&M Regional Relevance
description:
**Job Description**
**WHAT YOU’LL DO**
 We are looking for an experienced Senior Fashion Designer to join our Regional Assortment department with a focus on campaigns for collections across the world. This position will be based in our Head office in Stockholm but will require some travel to different regions from time to time.
   

  

 As a Designer for Regional Relevance, you will focus on creating collections for our different regions that require special attention to tailor our collections to suit the relevant target customer. As a Product Designer you will work closely with our teams in both Stockholm and regional to achieve this. You will set extended visual goals based on our main collection and will plan the assortment on a concept level together with the Regional Relevance Manager and Design Lead. You will be working with a wide assortment along with key fashion drops and local campaigns.
   

  

**Who You’ll Work With**
 As a Senior Designer you will work alongside our Lead Designer and will be part of a wider team of Designers, Product Developers, Planners, Pattern Makers, and a Product Manager.
   

  

 We are looking for Designers who love to collaborate, work in a team, and provide our diverse markets with the best products sold worldwide. Your handwriting will demonstrate a strong fashion level with commercial awareness! It will be key also to keep a high fashion sense for style and trends for the target customer, while maintaining a cost-conscious awareness throughout the design process.
   

  

 This is an amazing opportunity to collaborate with our fashion conscious, forward thinking global team. There will also be opportunities to travel along the way.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We are looking for a Designer with....
   

  

* A minimum of a BA/MA or equivalent experience in Fashion/Textile Design.
* 3+ years’ work experience as a Designer.
* Background from an aspirational global brand or retailer.
* International experience would be advantageous.
* High attention to detail with strong knowledge on Womenswear products.
* A creative mindset with a sharp eye for both current and future trends.
* Strong customer focus and commercial mindset for H&M´s global womenswear customer.
* Experience working closely with suppliers/factories in Asia and Europe.
* Strong skills in and used to working in Adobe Creative Suite programs.
* 3D CLO is advantageous.
* Demonstrated communication skills and a true collaborative team player.
* Independent, driven & proactive with “one step ahead” mindset.
* Organized & structured, able to set priorities and follow timelines.
* Flexible mindset and adaptable to changes in a fast-moving & growing industry.
* Experience or a desire to coach Junior Designers would be beneficial.
* Fluent in English (Swedish not necessary).


**Who We Are**
 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  

 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  

 All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here
   

  

**JOIN US**
 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.
   

  

 This is a full-time position is based in Stockholm. You will report to the department Assortment Designer
   

  

 If your experience, skills, and ambitions are right for this role, please send your application including CV and relevant portfolio work (pdf max 10mb/uploading). All documents should be in English.
   

  

 For internal candidates: please remember to always speak with your current manager when applying for an internal role. Please know that if you are currently permanently employed, you will keep this base employment status while taking on a temporary role.
   

  

* We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.


 The journey starts here

title: Product Designer II, Strategic AI Partnerships
description:
Delivering the best Spotify experience, everywhere and every time. Partner AI extends Spotify’s ubiquity into the AI-first era - embedding our experiences across assistants, devices, and multimodal platforms. We’re expanding our capacity to meet the growing demand from strategic AI partners and fast-emerging ecosystems across APAC.
   

  

 As a Product Designer II, you’ll help build how Spotify appears on influential partner integrations and device platforms. This is an exciting opportunity to craft adaptive, inclusive experiences that connect millions of listeners to what they love—anywhere, on any platform.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Build thoughtful, accessible experiences across AI assistants, chat interfaces, and connected devices.
* Use AI-assisted tools and in-build prototyping to iterate fast while maintaining design quality and clarity.
* Collaborate with localization teams and regional partners to ensure experiences feel relevant and intuitive.
* Work closely with Content Designers (Prompt / Conversational), User Research, Product, and Engineering to deliver cohesive outcomes.
* Apply and extend Spotify’s build language to new partner contexts while maintaining craft consistency.
* Use research findings to advise decisions and continually improve accessibility and happiness in every experience.


 Who You Are
   

  

* Experience in Product Design experience across platforms, integrations, or global products.
* Competent in scaling partner agnostic foundations into partner surfaces and contexts.
* Skilled in Figma and prototyping tools; eager to explore AI-enabled workflows.
* Collaborative and curious, motivated by working with cross-cultural teams and external partners.
* Comfortable balancing speed, structure, and creativity in a fast-moving environment.
* Bonus: Experience crafting for APAC markets or AI-adjacent interfaces (assistants, messaging apps, OEM devices).


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role is based in London or Stockholm.
* We offer the flexibility to work where you work best. Some in-person time helps us connect and create together. This position will require travel across Europe and Asia.


 Spotify is an equal opportunity employer. You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or what’s playing in your headphones. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forward-thinking! So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background. It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens.
   

  

 At Spotify, we are passionate about inclusivity and making sure our entire recruitment process is accessible to everyone. We have ways to request reasonable accommodations during the interview process and help assist in what you need. If you need accommodations at any stage of the application or interview process, please let us know - we’re here to support you in any way we can.
   

  

 Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008. Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators. Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting. Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Content Creator Internship (TikTok, Reels, Shorts) — HealthTech Startup Revolutionizing Sleep
description:
In line with what leading scientists say today: “
 ***The most powerful biohack is getting a good night’s sleep***
 ,” we’re committed to developing the most effective natural sleep enhancement technology in the world.
 



  





**Introduction** 




  





 Are you passionate about creating innovative
 **short-form video experiences** 
 that can impact global health? Join us in revolutionizing sleep health with cutting-edge storytelling as a
 **Content Creator Intern (TikTok, Reels, Shorts)** 
 . We’re looking for a motivated, curious intern to work closely with our founding team on building what will become the most effective medically certified solution for improved sleep.
 



  





**About Us** 




  





 We are a dynamic health tech startup, focused on addressing the widespread issue of poor sleep quality that affects billions worldwide. Our mission is to develop groundbreaking solutions that enhance sleep by leveraging the latest advancements in technology and science. If you’re passionate about improving sleep health and want hands-on experience in an early-stage startup, we want you on this journey.
 



  





**The Role (What you’ll do)** 




  




* **Own short-form content** 
 : ideate, script, shoot, and edit vertical videos for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.
* **Turn science into stories** 
 : translate complex sleep insights into punchy, human, 6–45s narratives with strong hooks and satisfying loops.
* **Prototype fast** 
 : produce multiple variants (A/B hooks, captions, thumbnails, sounds) and iterate based on data.
* **Analyze performance** 
 : track retention, watch time, “viewers stayed,” CTR, and follower growth; present weekly insights and next steps.
* **Community & creation** 
 : engage in comments/DMs, source UGC, and coordinate with creators/influencers.
* **Brand & compliance** 
 : protect our voice, visual system, and claims guidelines for health content on each platform.
* **Content ops** 
 : maintain a light content calendar, asset library, and posting workflows that scale.



  





**About You** 




  




* A portfolio or links to
 **vertical videos** 
 you’ve made (TikTok/Reels/Shorts).
* Obsessed with
 **hooks, pacing, and retention** 
 ; you think in first frames and loop points.
* Solid editing skills in
 **CapCut (mobile/desktop), Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or DaVinci** 
 ; comfortable with captions, timing, and light color/audio polish.
* Strong, concise
 **copywriting** 
 for on-screen text and captions; smart with hashtags/SEO.
* Data-curious: you love testing ideas and letting results guide the next cut.
* Excellent communication, collaborative mindset, and a bias to action.
* Bonus: motion graphics, thumbnail design (Figma/Canva), creator outreach, paid social basics, or familiarity with health/wellness topics.



  





**What We Offer** 




  




* **A meaningful seat** 
 in a mission tackling a global health challenge.
* **Close collaboration** 
 with the founding team across product, science, and engineering.
* **Real ownership** 
 : ship work that reaches users quickly and see your impact in the data.
* **Flexibility, autonomy** 
 , and a creative, supportive environment.
* **Potential post-internship opportunities** 
 based on performance.



  





**Apply:** 




  





 Ready to make a difference in global sleep health? Please send us your application. We’re eager to embark on this impactful journey with you!
 



  





***The internship is unpaid but may lead to future employment incl. equity.***

title: Design Lead (B2B)
description:
**We’ve signed up to an ambitious journey. Join us!**
*As Arrive, we guide customers and communities towards brighter futures and more livable cities, it isn’t a challenge just anyone could take on. Luckily, we have something to help us make it happen. Our people and our values. We Arrive Curious, Focused and Together. Just as our entire brand is inspired by the North Star, the shining light leading travelers to their destinations since time began, our values guide us. They help us be at our best. For our customers. For the cities and communities we serve. For ourselves. As a global team, we are transforming urban mobility. Let’s grow better, together.*
**Firstly, a Bit About The Team**
 We're the team behind Arrive's B2B business — one of the company’s fastest-growing and most strategically important areas. As B2B Design Lead, you’ll help shape products that solve real-world problems for businesses managing fleets and mobility at scale.
   

  

 Our mission? To become the trusted global mobility partner that boosts productivity and satisfaction through efficient and sustainable solutions. Whether it's streamlining parking expenses for SMBs or building data-powered platforms for enterprise fleets, we’re on a journey — from simplifying today’s admin to enabling tomorrow’s ecosystem of mobility services.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
 The B2B Design Lead at Arrive takes a strong and holistic ownership of the end to end user experience that’s under the remit of the department they’re working in.
   

  

 This role entails a mix of leading a small team as well as hands-on contributions to raise the bar on the quality of the experiences offered to Arrive's users.
   

  

 As B2B Design Lead you’ll report directly to the Head of Product Design and will collaborate closely with senior stakeholders in product, engineering and design, to shape the next steps of how the products should look, work and feel moving forward.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Through close collaboration with key stakeholders, ensure that the user experience of Arrive's products are the best they can possibly be.
* Coach, support and collaborate with a small, distributed team of skilled product designers to set both them and the department up for success. This includes spending time in 1:1’s, working with recruitment, onboarding new joiners, as well continuously improving ways of working, processes and overall maturity of design within the department.
* Whilst you’ll work with a team of designers, you’re also expected to have solid hands-on skills that you don’t mind leveraging with relative frequency. Your craft is at a level where you have an ability to truly elevate the quality of the products from a design standpoint.
* Aside from working with cross functional collaborators across the department, you’ll also work frequently with others in the wider organization: e.g. designers, UX researchers, UX writers and the design system team.


**What You’ll Bring To The Team**
* We expect you to have at least 5+ years of experience in design with 3+ years of lead/management/coaching experience.
* Solid experience working with cross functional teams, preferably in a product/SaaS context.
* We expect you to be a strong communicator in both written and verbal form.
* Track record of product-thinking, outcome-centric, high quality projects.
* Impeccable craft skills. Know-how in design tools and prototyping is a given. Understanding for or skills in UX research, UX writing, motion design, design systems, are seen as beneficial.


 We expect you to share an outstanding portfolio, giving a sense for your track record of shipping excellent products.
   

  

**About Us**
*Arrive, including brands like EasyPark, Flowbird, RingGo, ParkMobile, YourParkingSpace and Parkopedia, is a leading global mobility platform. Present in over 90 countries and 20,000 cities, the company helps people and decision-makers make smarter decisions about urban mobility and ease the experience of travel worldwide. Arrive delivers a unique combination of the core ingredients to make cities more livable: from smart payments and optimized car parks to data-driven traffic reduction and support for reinvestment in public transport and green space. It’s about more than function, it’s about saving time and simplifying the experience of travel for everyone. Travel is more than a journey, it’s how you Arrive.*
 Arrive, including brands like EasyPark, Flowbird, RingGo, ParkMobile and Parkopedia, is a leading global mobility platform. Present in over 90 countries and 20,000 cities, the company helps people and decision-makers make smarter decisions about urban mobility and ease the experience of travel worldwide. Arrive delivers a unique combination of the core ingredients to make cities more livable: from smart payments and optimized car parks to data-driven traffic reduction and support for reinvestment in public transport and green space. It’s about more than function, it’s about saving time and simplifying the experience of travel for everyone. Travel is more than a journey, it’s how you Arrive.

title: Product Design Lead
description:
Join Greenely's mission to lead Europe's energy transition. We are dedicated to reducing household energy bills to zero by optimizing energy usage and enabling virtual power generation. As we navigate the complexities of the energy sector, we are seeking a highly skilled and experienced
 **Product Design Lead** 
 to lead the product design development of our app and home electricity ecosystem. If you’re passionate about understanding customer needs, people management, balancing commercial considerations, and driving impactful product design strategies, we want you on our team.
   

  

 As a Product Design Lead at Greenely, you will be at the heart of our product design strategy, driving the vision, development, and implementation of our innovative solutions. You will lead the product design lifecycle from ideation to launch, ensuring that our platform consistently meets and exceeds customer expectations while delivering commercial success. Your customer-focused approach will be instrumental in creating products that resonate with users and contribute to Greenely’s mission. Your expertise in creating seamless user experiences and visually compelling and efficient designs will play a key role in shaping the future of our products.
   

  

******What you’ll be doing******
* Lead product design work end-to-end in the Greenely app as well as in other channels
* Shape and lead a team of product designers.
* Report to the CPO and represent and drive the design agenda within Product and Tech leadership
* Translates brand and product vision into coherent, scalable design systems and experiences across markets and platforms.
* Partner with Product, Tech, and Marketing leadership to shape product strategy.
* Conduct user research and usability testing to inform design decisions.
* Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs that enhance user experience.
* Leads creation and governance of a unified design language that scales across markets and products while enabling local relevance.
* Drive innovation by staying up-to-date with design trends and best practices.


****What you'll need to succeed****
* Solid experience in product design, with a proven track record of leading design efforts from discovery to launch.
* People leadership experience with emphasis on being a people-oriented leader
* Experience creating product design from ground up at multi-product consumer app companies in multi-markets.
* Strong understanding of UX principles and the ability to simplify complex user flows.
* Proficiency in design tools such as Figma, Sketch, or Adobe Creative Suite.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to present and justify design decisions.
* A results-driven mindset, with the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.


**What We Can Offer You 🏢👩‍💻**
* Flexibility: We are an office-first company that values in-person collaboration, offering flexible work arrangements to support your work-life balance. Our vibrant office is conveniently located in the heart of Stockholm at Vasagatan 40.
* Growth: Elevate your career with opportunities for skill development, challenging projects, and advancement within our forward-thinking organization.
* Influence and Impact: Your voice matters. Shape the future of energy by contributing your ideas, expertise, and playing a key role in decision-making.
* Innovative Environment: Thrive in an ever-changing industry, working on cutting-edge projects and staying ahead of the curve in a dynamic and pioneering work atmosphere.


**About Greenely**
 Greenely is on a mission to create the best customer experience for the modern energy consumer through technology. As a digital energy provider, we help people reduce their electricity costs by optimizing their home and car's electricity usage with our smart app. Supported by Nordic venture capital companies, we aim to enable households worldwide to connect, control, and optimize their energy usage. We believe that the best electricity is the one that is never used - a win-win for both wallets and the environment!
   

  

 WE ARE
 **bold and push the limit.**
 WE
 **energize each other** 
****.****
 WE
 **t** 
******hink like owners.******
 WE
 ****lead with knowledge.****
**Kindly, we do not accept applications via email as we protect your privacy. Thank you for your understanding.**
 Greenely is on a mission to create the best customer experience for the modern energy consumer by using technology. We are a digital energy provider that helps people reduce their electricity costs by optimizing the home and car's electricity usage with smart technology in an app.
   

  

 Greenely, with the support of Nordic venture capital companies, has a mission to make it possible for households all over the world to connect, control and optimize their energy usage. We ultimately believe that the best electricity is the one that is not used at all, both for the wallet and the planet!

title: Senior UX Researcher | Candy Crush Soda Saga
description:
**Craft:**
 UX & UI
   

  

**Job Description:**
 Do you want to champion the player voice and create memorable gaming experiences for millions of players worldwide? Are you experienced in several research methods and interested in a role with a lot of variety on a fantastic tight-knit team?
   

  

 We are looking for a proactive
 **Senior UX Researcher** 
 with a solid expertise in mixed methods . You will work within the Candy Crush Soda game team, giving a voice to millions of players from around the world by leading the effort of turning hard data into compelling stories, help craft the flow of our games/products, and be in the thick of team efforts to build great player experiences.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Design and lead mixed-methods research studies, including surveys, interviews, focus groups, usability testing, and other appropriate methodologies to address research questions.
* Collaborate with product, design and data scientists to define research objectives, identify research needs, and prioritize projects.
* Develop and maintain a deep understanding of our players, their behaviors, motivations, and needs, and use these insights to improve our players' experience with the game. Ensure that the player perspective is heard and acted upon in the King game design process.
* Translate research findings into actionable and impactful insights and recommendations, and effectively communicate them to the team.
* Establish, improve and promote UX research best practices and processes, and advocate for the role of research in the game team.
* Mentor and support more junior UX researchers, fostering a culture of curiosity, collaboration, and continuous learning within King.
* Stay current with the latest UX research trends, tools, and methodologies, and proactively explore opportunities to incorporate new approaches into our research practice.
* Use inclusive design methodologies, ensuring that we deliver experiences everybody can have access to.


 Skills to create thrills
   

  

* Extensive experience in user research, preferably in the gaming or mobile app industry.
* Expertise in a wide range of quantitative and qualitative research methods, with a proven ability to select and apply the appropriate methodology to address specific research questions.
* Experience in translating a player's insight into impactful features in game.
* Familiarity with testing tools such as UserTesting, PlaytestCloud,etc.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to synthesize complex data and draw meaningful conclusions.
* Proficiency in the research lifecycle, including: briefing, recruitment, questionnaire/discussion guide design, analysis, synthesis of findings, communication of insights.


**About King**
 With a mission of
 *Making the World Playful* 
 , King is a leading interactive entertainment company with more than 20 years of history of delivering some of the world’s most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry, including the world-famous Candy Crush franchise, as well as other mobile game hits such as
 *Farm Heroes Sag* 
 a. King games are played by more than 200 million monthly active users. King, part of Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT), has Kingsters in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona, Berlin, Dublin, San Francisco, New York, Los Angeles and Malta. More information can be found at King.com or by following us on LinkedIn, @lifeatking on Instagram, or @king\_games on X.

title: Product Manager - PayNow
description:
**We’ve signed up to an ambitious journey. Join us!**
*As Arrive, we guide customers and communities towards brighter futures and more livable cities, it isn’t a challenge just anyone could take on. Luckily, we have something to help us make it happen. Our people and our values. We Arrive Curious, Focused and Together. Just as our entire brand is inspired by the North Star, the shining light leading travelers to their destinations since time began, our values guide us. They help us be at our best. For our customers. For the cities and communities we serve. For ourselves. As a global team, we are transforming urban mobility. Let’s grow better, together.*
**About The Role**
 As a
 **Product Manager** 
 on the
 **PayNow** 
 team, you’ll shape Arrive’s real-time payments experience — powering millions of parking sessions every day through Apple Pay, Google Pay, card-on-file, and third-party integrations.
   

  

 You’ll partner with engineers and cross-functional teams to ensure payment flows are fast, reliable, and seamless from the first tap to the final capture. If you’re excited by large-scale payment challenges and improving customer conversion through smarter orchestration and higher auth rates, this role is for you.
   

  

**Your Mission**
 Own and evolve Arrive’s
 **core card-on-file payment experience** 
 across all markets.
   

  

 Enhance authorisation performance, scalability, and user experience while expanding global and local payment methods and optimising processing and interchange costs.
   

  

**What You Will Drive**
* The User Payment Experience: Analyze user behavior across different markets and platforms to optimize conversion rates and remove friction. You’ll be the expert on market-specific constraints, like 3DS logic and SCA, turning complexity into a smooth experience.
* Payment Infrastructure Evolution: Define the roadmap for our integrations with leading payment service providers, from adding new global payment methods to optimizing every aspect of our payment stack—including performance, resilience, and cost.
* Cross-Functional Impact: Collaborate with engineering, risk, legal, and data teams to build a seamless end-to-end payment flow. Your work will ensure our solutions meet global regulations and business needs.
* Feature Lifecycle Ownership: Take a feature from a concept to a fully launched product. You’ll manage the backlog, define success metrics, and use data to make informed decisions and continuously improve.
* Team Empowerment: Inspire your team to solve the right problems. You'll create a partnership built on trust and a shared vision, celebrating both successes and key learnings.


**You’ll Thrive If You**
* Have hands-on experience with card and wallet payments, tokenisation, and PSP integrations (Adyen, Cybersource, Stripe, etc.).
* Understand MIT/CIT, SCA, and card scheme requirements across markets.
* Have worked on high-volume transactional products balancing conversion, resilience, and fraud prevention.
* Communicate clearly and collaborate effectively across technical, design, and commercial teams.
* Use data to identify opportunities, optimise performance, and guide decisions.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in Business, Technology, or related field (advanced degree preferred).
* 8–10 years of experience in payments or product management, ideally within digital or real-time payments.
* Experience operating across European and U.S. markets, with knowledge of compliance and regulatory frameworks.
* Strong analytical, problem-solving, and collaboration skills.
* Familiarity with agile methodologies and API-driven development.


**About Us**
*Arrive, including brands like EasyPark, Flowbird, RingGo, ParkMobile, YourParkingSpace and Parkopedia, is a leading global mobility platform. Present in over 90 countries and 20,000 cities, the company helps people and decision-makers make smarter decisions about urban mobility and ease the experience of travel worldwide. Arrive delivers a unique combination of the core ingredients to make cities more livable: from smart payments and optimized car parks to data-driven traffic reduction and support for reinvestment in public transport and green space. It’s about more than function, it’s about saving time and simplifying the experience of travel for everyone. Travel is more than a journey, it’s how you Arrive.*

Present in over 90 countries and 20,000 cities, the company helps people and decision-makers make smarter decisions about urban mobility and ease the experience of travel worldwide. Arrive delivers a unique combination of the core ingredients to make cities more livable: from smart payments and optimized car parks to data-driven traffic reduction and support for reinvestment in public transport and green space.
