title: Senior IT Consultant - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 For our Stockholm office, we are looking for Senior IT Consultants to collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or The Boston Consulting Group on national and international client projects! You will be independently structuring project modules and supporting junior project members. Together with our clients, you will develop superior IT strategies, concepts, and solutions actively and on site, applying your sound technical know-how, your understanding of business contexts, and your analytical and conceptual skills.
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

**You can help us make a difference if you**
* completed a university degree in computer science, informatics, engineering, business or a related field with higher-than-average grades
* bring a minimum of four years relevant experience in IT consulting, in the course of which you ran transformation and implementation projects in terms of both strategy and operations
* have led project teams of more than three people
* know exactly what the buzzwords machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile, AI, and robotics mean
* are familiar with all the stages of development for successful IT organizations and IT processes.
* know exactly how to put together complex business cases
* feel particularly comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts and are flexible and willing to travel
* are on a fluent level of understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* Form the digital transformation of globally leading companies while maintaining a clear view of overall technical solutions and client circumstances
* Drive groundbreaking projects forward by using agile methods and modern approaches within the scope of strategic IT implementation for clients and by actively steering the relevant modules
* Smooth the path for tailored, future-oriented customer journeys based on precise analysis of the situation and with current market developments and trends such as machine learning in mind
* Design and optimize unique IT architectures within the framework of enterprise solution requirements, modern custom software developments, and sustainable digital solutions, including cyber resilience


 Additional info
   

  

**How To Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*
*#BCGPlatinion*
 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: Learning & Inclusion Lead
description:
We’re looking for a trailblazer in Learning & Inclusion — someone who combines deep expertise in leadership with a bold vision for how people learn in the age of AI. As the Lead you will architect next-generation learning experiences that prepare leaders to thrive in a world defined by constant disruption, digital acceleration, and human-AI collaboration.
   

  

 This isn’t about traditional training programs. It’s about building a culture of continuous, inclusive learning — powered by technology, data, and imagination. If you’re passionate about shaping the future of learning and unlocking human potential at scale, we want to talk to you.
   

  

**Why This Role Matters**
 In an era where AI is reshaping work, inclusive human leadership has never been more important. This role ensures our leaders are ready — not just to manage change, but to lead with clarity, empathy, equity, and boldness. You will be at the forefront of redefining leadership for the next decade, blending the best of human potential with the power of technology.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Reimagine Leadership Development for the AI Era: Build programs that develop future-ready, inclusive leaders who can adapt, inspire, and lead across diverse teams.
* Integrate AI-driven personalization, predictive analytics, and adaptive learning platforms into every stage of leadership development.
* Design Next-Gen Learning Experiences: Combine neuroscience, behavioral science, and emerging tech to create experiences that stick. Blend coaching, immersive simulations, and digital-first learning that resonates across geographies, cultures, and identities.
* Champion Inclusion & Belonging: Embed inclusive leadership principles in all programs, ensuring leaders know how to foster psychological safety, equity, and diverse thinking. Use AI responsibly to democratize access to learning and reduce bias in leadership development.
* Scale Impact Through Technology: Experiment with generative AI, VR/AR, and learning platforms to create immersive leadership journeys. Use AI to analyze skills gaps, predict learning needs, and deliver just-in-time development at scale.
* Elevate Culture & Performance: Act as a trusted advisor to senior leaders navigating change, disruption, and digital transformation.Make learning part of the flow of work, ensuring inclusion and development become a strategic advantage for the business.
* Measure What Matters: Leverage advanced analytics to track impact and prove ROI. Continuously refine strategies to ensure programs deliver business value and fuel innovation.


 Who You Are
   

  

* 10+ years in Learning, Talent, or Leadership Development with proven impact at scale.
* Deep expertise in leadership development combined with curiosity and comfort in emerging technologies (AI, adaptive platforms, digital coaching tools).
* Demonstrated commitment to equity, diversity, and inclusion in learning and leadership strategies.
* Strong facilitation skills with the ability to influence and coach executives across cultures and perspectives.
* Experience embedding learning into organizational culture and driving large-scale transformation.
* A champion of inclusion, making leadership accessible, equitable, and human-centered.
* A technologist at heart, leveraging AI and emerging tools without losing the human touch.
* A storyteller and influencer who inspires leaders to embrace change.
* A passion for human potential and a mindset that embraces experimentation, agility, and data.
* A data-driven innovator who measures success not by hours trained but by business outcomes achieved.
* Advanced degree in Organizational Development, Psychology, HR, or related field (preferred)


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role can be based in London, UK or Stockholm, SWE
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home. We ask that you come in 2-3 times a week.


 Spotify is an equal opportunity employer. You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or what’s playing in your headphones. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forward-thinking! So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background. It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens.
   

  

 At Spotify, we are passionate about inclusivity and making sure our entire recruitment process is accessible to everyone. We have ways to request reasonable accommodations during the interview process and help assist in what you need. If you need accommodations at any stage of the application or interview process, please let us know - we’re here to support you in any way we can.
   

  

 Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008. Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators. Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting. Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Informationssäkerhetsspecialist till Saab!
description:
*Vill du arbeta med att stärka Sveriges säkerhet genom att bidra med din kompetens inom IT- och informationssäkerhet? Vi söker nu en engagerad
 **IT- och Informationssäkerhetsspecialist** 
 som vill vara en nyckelperson i vårt säkerhetsarbete.*
**Din roll:**
 Som IT- och informationssäkerhetsspecialist får du en central roll i arbetet med att skydda och utveckla våra system och IT-miljöer. Du leder och stöttar projekt i säkerhetsarbetet och omsätter säkerhetskrav till funktionella och tekniska lösningar. Tillsammans med kollegor och samarbetspartners är du med och bygger robusta och hållbara miljöer där informationssäkerhet är en självklar del.
   

  

 I ditt arbete kommer du bland annat att:
   

  

* Leda och stötta projekt inom IT- och informationssäkerhet
* Omsätta säkerhetskrav till säkerhetsfunktioner och tekniska lösningar
* Arbeta med riskhantering samt risk- och sårbarhetsanalyser
* Hantera och följa upp säkerhetskrav
* Delta i ackrediteringsarbete
* Genomföra tester kopplade till säkerhetsfunktioner


**Din profil:**
* Minst två års arbetslivserfarenhet inom komplex IT-infrastruktur, IT-säkerhet eller informationssäkerhet
* Eftergymnasial utbildning med teknisk inriktning, exempelvis IT, data- och systemvetenskap eller IT- och informationssäkerhet


**Vi ser gärna att du har:**
* Erfarenhet från arbete inom försvarssektorn
* Kunskap om försvarsrelaterade och internationella standarder/ramverk, t.ex. KSF 3.1, NATO, NIST, ISO 27000, NIS2, CIS 18, MITRE ATT&CK
* Kännedom om lagar och regelverk inom informationssäkerhet, t.ex. offentlighets- och sekretesslagen samt säkerhetsskyddslagen


**Vi ser att du är:**
 För att trivas i rollen behöver du vara analytisk, nyfiken och ha ett starkt säkerhetsmedvetande. Du har lätt för att dokumentera och kommunicera både på svenska och engelska, och du är självgående samtidigt som du uppskattar samarbete. Framför allt brinner du för att inspirera andra och bidra till en stark säkerhetskultur.
   

  

**Vad du blir en del av**
 Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Med 26 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem.
   

  

 Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga.

title: Senior Cyber Security Project Manager – 14431
description:
We are looking for a Senior Cyber Security Project Manager to join our dynamic team.
 



  





**What you will work on:** 



* Lead complex, cross-functional cybersecurity initiatives that strengthen global security capabilities across products, platforms and connected services
* Manage end-to-end delivery of cybersecurity projects, ensuring alignment with strategy, regulations and technical direction
* Coordinate architecture, requirements and technical decisions across multiple teams and international stakeholders
* Improve cybersecurity processes, frameworks and governance models to enhance security maturity
* Ensure compliance with relevant standards and regulations, including secure development practices
* Drive cross-functional collaboration with engineering, product, security and leadership teams
* Handle communication, stakeholder alignment and escalation management in a global, multi-brand environment
* Provide structured reporting on project progress, risks, dependencies and overall cybersecurity posture



  





**What you bring:** 



* 7+ years of experience as a senior project manager driving large, complex technical initiatives, ideally within automotive, IT, cybersecurity or embedded systems
* Strong ability to navigate global stakeholder landscapes and multi-brand environments
* Solid understanding of cybersecurity principles across product, system and IT/OT domains
* Experience with secure development lifecycles, risk management, threat modelling and certification processes
* Confidence in discussing and challenging cybersecurity architecture across hardware, software, cloud and connectivity
* Experience setting up or improving security-related processes, frameworks and governance models
* Familiarity with standards such as ISO 21434 and UNECE R155/R156 (meriting)
* Experience with Functional Safety (ISO 26262) or safety-related development (meriting)
* Background in automotive, embedded systems or large-scale industrial systems (meriting)
* Certifications such as CISSP, CISM, PMP or SAFe (meriting)
* Structured, proactive and analytical mindset with excellent communication skills
* Ability to lead in a matrix organisation without formal authority, building strong relationships across functions
* High integrity and professionalism in handling sensitive security information

title: Testledare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Akademisk examen inom IT, civilingenjör motsvarande.
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av arbete som testledare
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av arbete som verksamhetsanalytiker
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av att facilitera workshops med verksamhetsresurser
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av arbete som kravansvarig
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av förändringsledning
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av arbete inom statlig myndighet


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med tekniskt komplicerade ärendehanteringssystem
* God kommunikatör både muntligt och skriftligt


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 08-12-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Chief Product Officer (CPO)
description:
*“Managing our products is pretty much managing the whole company. Being, alongside the CEO, responsible for the success of a company and all its employees is not a small task but for the right person it's a blast.”*
**Locatio** 
**n:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden (Hybrid)
   

  

**Employment Type:** 
 Full-time
   

  

**Industry:** 
 iGaming / Slot Game Development
   

  

**Welcome to Thunderkick!**
 With ambitious plans for growth and expansion into a new version of the company we have several key roles to fill. Not only will we scale our business, but we will also add to it new interesting verticals.
   

  

 Enter the future of slot game development and distribution where curious and ambitious people have the best chances to shine and thrive. If you’re someone who likes turning bold ideas into real action, you will feel at home here.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We’re looking for an experienced Chief Product Officer (CPO) to lead the vision, strategy, and execution of our next generation of slot games. As the creative and strategic force behind our product portfolio, you’ll shape the future of entertainment for millions of players around the world.
   

  

 You’ll oversee the full product lifecycle — from concept to release — driving innovation, quality, and differentiation in a competitive market. You’ll collaborate closely with talented teams in game design, art, math, tech, and commercial to deliver exceptional player experiences that stay true to our brand’s creative DNA.
   

  

**To be successful in this role at Thunderkick:**
 Strategic Vision: You are a visionary leader with a deep understanding of the iGaming landscape, capable of setting and executing a strategic product vision.
   

  

 Communication: You have a talent for explaining complex matters to anyone and you approach people with respect and dignity.
   

  

 Collaborative Leadership: You are a collaborative person who can inspire and motivate cross-functional colleagues to deliver and perform at their best.
   

  

 Customer-Centric Approach: You have a customer-centric mindset, dedicated to delivering products that meet and exceed the expectations from our B2B customers as well from our end-users.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Define and own the global product strategy across all slot titles.
* Lead and inspire a multidisciplinary product organization — game producers, designers, mathematicians, and product owners.
* Oversee the creative and commercial roadmap, ensuring balance between artistic innovation and business growth.
* Identify new opportunities in mechanics, themes, and features that push the boundaries of player engagement.
* Collaborate with leadership on company strategy, partnerships, and studio direction.
* Extensively play our games while in development - no rotten apples.


**About You**
 You’re both a visionary and a doer. You combine deep understanding of slot game design and player psychology with strong business acumen. You thrive on collaboration and have a proven track record of delivering hit games or successful product portfolios in the iGaming space.
   

  

**We’re looking for:**
* 5+ years of experience in game production or product leadership, preferably in slots or casino gaming.
* A strong portfolio of released games with proven commercial successes.
* Deep understanding of RTP, volatility, math models, art styles, sound, and animation and how they all contribute to maximize player experience.
* Strategic mindset with proven ability to translate creative ambition into measurable success.


**Why Join Us?**
* Take creative ownership of an ambitious and respected slot portfolio.
* Lead a team of passionate creators who value artistry, humour, and precision.
* Work in a studio that encourages innovation, experimentation, and autonomy.
* Enjoy a supportive, flexible work culture with room for experimentation and professional growth.
* A culture built on trust, collaboration, and fun.


**Recruitment process:**
 Simple, transparent, and human:
   

  

* Apply – Send us your CV/portfolio.
* Intro Call – A quick chat about you, us, and the role.
* Competence Step – Interview, case, portfolio review, or technical interview depending on the position.
* Team Fit – Meet the crew you’ll work with.
* Offer – If we’re aligned, welcome aboard.


**Life at Thunderkick**
 We offer a friendly, inspiring workplace with great people, creative energy, and lots of opportunities to explore new ideas. Our centrally located Stockholm office, minutes away from T-Centralen, gives you an easy, vibrant workspace to collaborate and create. Social events, hybrid flexibility, fika moments, and a balanced pace make Thunderkick a place where you can do your best work — and enjoy it.

title: CRM DevOps Engineer - Shape the Future of Corporate Payments | SEB Kort, Solna
description:
SEB Kort is looking for an experienced, technically strong, and driven CRM DevOps Engineer. You are a DevOps engineer with a strong focus on support and deployment processes, ensuring the smooth deployment, maintenance, optimization, and operation of Dynamics 365 CRM solutions. Joining our dynamic international team, you will play a key role in our mission to be the market leader for corporate payments in Europe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a CRM DevOps engineer, you will be part of our international agile CRM Dynamics 365 platform team, manage and maintain our Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM application that support our wide range of card and payment products. You will plan, design, develop, test, and maintain solutions together with your agile team.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Administration of our Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM landscape, including user management, system configuration, and ongoing maintenance.
* Support production and non-production environments, ensuring system stability and availability.
* Manage and optimize CI/CD pipelines for Dynamics 365 CRM deployments (including automation of deployment processes)
* Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and provide incident resolution.
* Collaborate with developers, testers, and business stakeholders to ensure seamless releases.
* Implement best practices for security, compliance, and governance in CRM deployments.
* Taking an active role in sharing your knowledge and contributing to improving customer experience


**Who You Are**
 We believe you are an experienced DevOps engineer who combines strong technical skills with excellent communication ability. You are a problem-solver, team player, and systems thinker who takes initiative and contributes to the bigger picture, always with the customer in mind.
   

  

**Who We Are Looking For**
* A completed degree in Computer Science or a comparable qualification
* Strong experience with the administration of Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM (Sales and Customer Service modules)
* Strong experience in incident management, monitoring, and support operations
* Experience in common programming languages and technologies in the CRM environment, such as JavaScript, .NET, C#, PowerShell is desirable
* Confident use of modern Microsoft Azure technologies such as Active Directory is an advantage
* Conceptual and analytical skills as well as quick comprehension and a goal-oriented way of working
* Practical experience with DevOps and agile methodologies is a must
* Fluency in English


**What We Offer**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued. We offer several experiences and benefits to our employees:
   

  

* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Excellent office environment
* Work-life balance


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **21st of December, 2025** 
 . If you have questions about the position, please contact Olga Wohlfahrt, Talent Acquisition Partner, at olga.wohlfahrt@seb.se, but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: AI/ML Engineer
description:
***Redpill Linpro är ett företag med djupa rötter inom Open Source och arbetar med de senaste tekniska lösningarna inom våra kärnområden DevOps, API & Integration, Analytics och Cloud. Vi har några av Nordens tyngsta experter inom Azure, AWS, Apache Kafka, Linux, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, för att nämna några exempel. Vi arbetar med åtaganden och utvecklingsprojekt i många olika branscher i Sverige, Norge och Danmark.***
 Vi letar nu efter en AI/ML Engineer till vår Data & Analytics-enhet. I de här rollen kommer du att spela en central roll i att fortsätta utveckla vårt erbjudande. Du kommer att arbeta med kunder som redan kommit en bit på sin resa mot att bli datadrivna och hjälpa dem att utveckla moderna lösningar med hjälp av de senaste teknikerna inom AI och Analytics. Som AI/ML Engineer förstår du att grunden i varje sådan satsning är en säker tillgång till relevant data och det är din roll som konsult att hjälpa våra kunder på den resan. Du måste därför njuta av att både vara hands-on, använda en whiteboard och utmana kunderna, dig själv och det team du arbetar i.
   

  

**Vi letar efter dig som har erfarenhet av följande:**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet som AI/ML Engineer eller motsvarande
* Relevant akademisk utbildning
* Kunskap om maskininlärningsmodeller och generativ AI
* Erfarenhet av Databricks, Spark och Kafka
* Erfarenhet av utveckling i Python samt SQL
* Erfarenhet av visualiseringsverktyg som Power BI, Qlik eller Tableau
* Erfarenhet av uppsättning av cloud-infrastruktur i AWS, GCP eller Azure
* Erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code, med verktyg som t ex Terraform
* Erfarenhet av automatiserade releaseprocesser, DevOps och CI / CD
* Erfarenhet av datamodellering (strukturerad och ostrukturerad data)
* Erfarenhet av agil utveckling
* Erfarenhet av konsultrollen
* Flytande i svenska och engelska


 Vill du vara med på resan? Sök tjänsten nu – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

 Redpill Linpro is the leading provider of Open Source services and products in the Nordics. We are located in seven offices with a mission to share knowledge and best practices for a more open society.
   

  

 We are passionate about open solutions, open business models, and an open society where we work together for maximum benefit to everyone. We have got some really skilled co-workers here at Redpill Linpro, particularly within our main areas: API management, development, IT operations, data analytics, customer experience, cloud, DevOps, and automation.
   

  

**May the Source be with you!**

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**Om rollen**
 Nu söker vi dig som har erfarenhet inom maskininlärning! Att vara anställd på B3 innebär att du hjälper våra kunder i deras utvecklingsprojekt och dagliga utmaningar. Vi ser gärna att du har vana att arbeta såväl självständigt som kundnära och är van vid ett agilt teambaserat arbetssätt.
   

  

**Vi letar efter dig som har:**
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad arbetserfarenhet inom maskininlärning eller liknande område
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller
* Gedigen erfarenhet inom minst ett programmeringsspråk (te.x. Python, Scala eller R)
* Erfarenhet av SQL och databashantering
* Erfarenhet av dataanalys- och visualiseringsverktyg så som Pandas, Matplotlib
* Kunskap om maskininlärningsbibliotek som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
* Behärskar god svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Vad vi erbjuder:**
 Att vi trivs tillsammans på B3 är otroligt viktigt. Anledningen till att många börjar hos oss är bland annat det stora fokuset på
 **kompetensutveckling** 
 , där vi kontinuerligt delar kunskap med varandra och uppmuntrar till kompetensutveckling och certifieringar. Vi erbjuder bland annat:
   

  

* Generös kompetensutveckling
* Attraktiv lönemodell
* En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning


**Om B3**
 B3 är en börsnoterad koncern och trygg arbetsgivare med hög medarbetarnöjdhet. B3 har ca 1000 medarbetare inom många olika expertområden. B3 är rankad som Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work, utsett till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022 och 2023, samt vann utmärkelsen Årets Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever efter våra värdeord erfarenhet, olikheter och energi samt satsar på hållbarhet i alla led. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra presterar bättre och har därför B3 Team som anordnar aktiviteter inom wellness, från yoga och löpning till musikquiz och föreläsningar om stresshantering och mental hälsa.
   

  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!**
 Har du frågor om tjänsten? Tveka inte att kontakta rekryteringsansvarig, Lidia Hagos, för denna tjänst på lidia.hagos@b3.se.

title: Data Engineer / Cloud Developer within Advanced Analytics
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 We are now looking for a seasoned developer within Data Engineering to strengthen the Product Analytics team within the Connected Analytics unit. You will be working as part of an agile team to enable various units within TRATON R&D worldwide in accessing comprehensive amounts of connected vehicle data and create data products, self-service analytics and visualizations based on the data of a fleet of several hundred thousand vehicles. As part of the team, you will participate in the short- and long-term planning of deliveries and technologies, the prioritization and according implementation.
   

  

 In your role, you will bring in your competence and efforts to continuously improve and scale the toolset through which we create data availability and insights for the various consumers within TRATON R&D. You will cooperate with data providers and consumers alike (data engineers, data scientists and AI experts, engineers, analysts, statisticians, product and service owners) and develop high quality data products and self-service in a sustainable and scalable way.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Scale up and continuously improve the toolset to enable advanced analytics and data sharing for TRATON R&D
* Develop data products and create insights based on connected vehicle data
* Take ownership for the complete life-cycle of the solutions you create, from requirements, planning, implementation to maintenance and continuous improvements
* Accelerate and scale the team’s efforts by applying latest technologies and methods
* Contribute to the continuous improvement process of the team and share your knowledge to support the journey to being a data-driven and AI-ready company
* Ensure reliable, scalable and cyber secure solutions by applying and continuously improving the team’s DevSecOps methods
* Keep a clear focus on efficiency, managing the balance between cost, customer value and elimination of waste


**Who You Are**
 As a person, you are analytical and communicative. Establishing a personal network within the organization to find the best possible solution to a problem is easy for you. You embrace diversity and cooperation and are experienced in mentoring and leading teams. You have a supportive mindset when engaging stakeholders and consumers of your solutions, and like to put in an extra effort for satisfied customers.
   

  

 In your career, you have worked with large scale data sets and industrial solutions in cloud environments. You show professional habits and skills when it comes to tooling, coding, testing, deploying and documentation. You have a proven track record in at least some of the relevant areas of the field such as cloud data warehouses, data processing, statistics, data science and analytics, data- and ML-pipelining, DevSecOps, cloud infrastructure and agile development.
   

  

 Having worked with operational vehicle data, diagnostic data, geospatial data, or comparable large data sets in similar industries is a merit; as is leadership experience as Scrum Master, Project Lead or similar.
   

  

 Your work is based on the following (or comparable) skills and tooling (examples): Python / SQL / C#, AWS, CICD, Gitlab, Grafana, Snowflake, Databricks, Azure AD, front-end development (e.g. Vue) and visualization, statistics and analytics (e.g. SAS Viya, Power-BI).
   

  

 You have an academic education at university level in computer science, engineering physics, electrical engineering or equivalent work experience. You communicate fluently in English, in both speech and writing.
   

  

**This Is Us**
 Our unit is part of the Connected Vehicle Data and Analytics section within the Cloud Embedded Platform domain of TRATON R&D, which is the global development organization for the brands Scania and MAN in Europe and the brand International in the US. With our global organization, we deliver innovative and sustainable solutions with the customer value at the heart of everything.
   

  

 The team Product Analytics is part of a line- and flow-organization which is working globally according to SAFe. We ensure that TRATON R&D has access to the data and analytics capabilities needed for informed decision making.
   

  

 Within our organization, we value a culture of collaboration and learning, with respect for the individual. As a member of the team, you have the opportunity to shape your work and the future of the transportation industry with us.
   

  

**Scania Offers**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-12-10. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:
   

  

 Frank Deubzer, Group Manager, frank.deubzer@scania.com
   

  

 We look forward to your application!

title: Business Analysis Stream Lead – Banking/Finance
description:
**📌 Hiring: Business Analysis Stream Lead – Banking/Finance** 




**📍 Location: Stockholm | Hybrid (80% onsite)** 




**🇸🇪 Candidate must already be in Sweden - Valid work permit required. No sponsorship available.** 




  





 ·       We are supporting a major transformation program in the financial sector and are now looking for an experienced Stream Lead with strong Business Analysis expertise. In this role, you will lead a dedicated sub-stream, drive requirements work, shape migration plans, and ensure end-to-end alignment between business needs and technical delivery.
 



  





 🔹
 **What you will do** 




 ·       Lead a substream within a large transformation program
 



 ·       Drive requirements analysis, requirements definition, and solution design
 



 ·       Translate business needs into feasible, sustainable technical solutions
 



 ·       Lead and co-create migration plans with business stakeholders
 



 ·       Participate in testing, support UAT, and ensure solutions meet business & technical expectations
 



 ·       Support change management, including communication and training
 



 ·       Collaborate closely with multiple stakeholders across business & IT
 



  





**🔹 What you bring** 




 ·       Solid experience in requirements management & analysis
 



 ·       Hands-on experience defining and leading migration plans in large programs
 



 ·       Strong understanding of technical validation, testing processes, and operational impacts
 



 ·       Ability to translate business needs into clear technical solution proposals
 



 ·       Experience working in complex, cross-functional environments
 



 ·       Confident in leading communication, workshops, training, and UAT
 



 ·       Structured, analytical, and able to see the big picture
 



 ·       Experience with PEGA or similar BPM/workflow platforms is a plus
 



 ·       Strong stakeholder management and decision-anchoring skills
 



 ·       Independent, proactive, and able to act as an advisor on complex topics
 



  





**🔹 Must Have:** 




 ·       Must be currently based in Sweden
 



 ·       Must have a valid work permit/visa - No sponsorship provided
 



 ·       Has previous experience working at Swedbank (or a similar major Swedish bank)
 



 ·       Has some experience with PEGA (not expert-level, but familiar enough)
 



 ·       Has testing experience (UAT, system testing, validation, etc.)
 



 ·       English-speaking is required; Swedish is preferred.

title: Manager - Acceleration Team
description:
*Saab is evolving fast — and software and AI are at the core. Be part of that acceleration. Join the team that empowers Saab’s developers — and play a key role in modernising our software engineering landscape.*
 Your role
   

  

 In this role, you will lead an acceleration team within Common Tech, consisting of software developers who work closely with our business areas in developing SAAB wide modules and products. You will work closely with internal stakeholders and customers to ensure that your team’s initiatives deliver real value to the business.
   

  

 You are responsible for providing structure, clarity and direction in ongoing projects, creating the conditions for your team to succeed. The work involves close collaboration with leaders and colleagues across the organisation, and your leadership will be key to maintaining progress and alignment.
   

  

 As line manager, you have overall responsibility for the team and its operations. This includes leading and coaching team members to build engagement, development and performance, as well as managing all personnel-related matters such as recruitment, onboarding, competence development, budgeting and financial follow-up.
   

  

 Your profile
   

  

 We are looking for someone with a strategic mindset who can also bring structure and clarity to complex work, and who is an inclusive and supportive leader, able to balance strategic and operational perspectives while fostering collaboration and development within their team.
   

  

 The key requirements for this role include:
   

  

* Proven experience leading technically complex or software-intensive projects.
* Understanding of industrial system development processes.
* Experience in leading and coaching teams to achieve engagement, development, and results.
* Strong organisational and planning skills to maintain structure and progress in projects.
* Strong communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Fluent in Swedish and English.


*This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.*
 What you will be part of
   

  

 Explore a wealth of possibilities. Take on challenges, create smart inventions, and grow beyond. This is a place for curious minds, brave pioneers, and everyone in between. Together, we achieve the extraordinary, each bringing our unique perspectives. Your part matters.
   

  

 Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 26,100 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.
   

  

 Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here
   

  

 Kindly observe that this is an ongoing recruitment process and that the position might be filled before the closing date of the advertisement.

title: SAP Engagement Manager
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible.
   

  

 At Packaged Based Solutions (PBS) Nordics, a Capgemini unit, we specialize in ERP transformation for public and private sectors, using platforms like SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and IFS to help organizations achieve operational excellence and strategic growth. With a strong Nordic presence and a diverse global client base, we guide clients through seamless ERP transformations that deliver lasting value.
   

  

 Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, inclusive world!
   

  

**Your role**
 As an SAP Engagement Manager, you will be responsible for leading and managing client engagements, ensuring successful delivery of SAP projects, and building strong, long-lasting relationships with our clients.
   

  

 Do you want to make a significant impact and advance your career in a collaborative and innovative environment with well-known customers this could be the role for you!
   

  

*In this role you will play a key role in:*
* Understanding client's needs, aligning project objectives with company goals, and ensuring the successful completion of the project at hand.
* Lead SAP implementation projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.
* Play a central role in building, maintaining and enhancing client relationships and working collaboratively with solution architects and technical consultants for preparing appropriate response to RFP documents.
* Identify and mitigate risks associated with project delivery, ensuring smooth execution and client satisfaction.


**Your profile**
* Minimum 10 years of experience in SAP project management with good delivery or pre-sales background having demonstrated experience in managing projects.
* Strong understanding of SAP solutions and proven ability to manage complex projects, lead cross-functional teams and ability to respond to RFP and estimation capabilities.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with clients and team members.


*Note: Nordic-based and fluency in English; proficiency in Swedish is preferred. Open to travel.*
**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations.
* A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, Modesty, Fun, and Boldness.
* A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person.
* An extensive benefits package, including parental benefits, occupational and flex pension, private insurance, preventive healthcare, and more.


**Application**
*In this recruitment process, we review applications and hire on an ongoing basis.
 *As part of our recruitment process, identity verification will be conducted through inspection of your ID card, and background checks may be carried out as required* 
 .*
**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is an AI-powered global business and technology transformation partner, delivering tangible business value. We imagine the future of organizations and make it real with AI, technology and people. With our strong heritage of nearly 60 years, we are a responsible and diverse group of 420,000 team members in more than 50 countries. We deliver end-to-end services and solutions with our deep industry expertise and strong partner ecosystem, leveraging our capabilities across strategy, technology, design, engineering and business operations. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

**Make it real |** 
**www.capgemini.com**

title: IT-forensiker och IT-handläggare
description:
Arbetsplatsbeskrivning
   

  

 Är du redo för en större uppgift?
   

  

 Polismyndigheten är Sveriges största myndighet med ca 40 000 medarbetare över hela landet. Hos oss får du möjlighet att bidra till Polisens uppdrag – att öka tryggheten och minska brottsligheten i samhället.
   

  

 Vid region Stockholms utredningsenhet finns sektionen Regionalt IT-brottscentrum 1. Sektionen innehåller flera olika kompetensområden; IT-forensik, internetinhämtning samt analys av transaktioner med kryptovalutor - alla med fokus på att komplettera och bidra till regionens utredningsverksamhet.
   

  

 Sektionen ansvarar för att extrahera data ur beslag och sedan analysera den data som är relevant för förundersökningen. Målet är att arbetet ska generera sakkunnigutlåtanden och undersökningsprotokoll. Eftersom IT-relevans förekommer i många brottstyper är sektionens kompetens viktig för framgång i brottsutredningar. Sektionen har även som uppdrag att bidra till kompetenshöjningen av utredningsverksamheten avseende IT-relaterad brottslighet. Hos oss får du helt enkelt möjlighet till en vardag där du känner att ditt arbete är till nytta för samhället.
   

  

 Verksamheten bedrivs i Solna, Västberga, Visby och på Kungsholmen. Vi söker nu både IT-forensiker och IT-handläggare som är strukturerade, ambitiösa och professionella. Vi har ett väl inarbetat introduktionsprogram som säkerställer att alla nya IT-forensiker och IT-handläggare når upp till en gemensam bas.
   

  

 Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 Hos oss kommer du att arbeta med beslagtagna enheter som innehåller digital datalagring, vilket huvudsakligen innebär säkring av data. I rollen som IT-forensiker tillkommer dessutom arbete med analys och slutsatstagande av säkrade data. Som IT-forensiker bistår du även i operativt arbete, vilket innebär både beredskapstjänstgöring och att du biträder vid husrannsakan. Arbetet ställer därför krav på god fysisk förmåga, då du kan komma att vistas i krävande utrymme och miljöer. Beredskapstjänstgöring innebär att du utför brådskande IT-forensiska arbeten utanför kontorstid.
   

  

 Gemensamt för båda tjänsterna är att du arbetar i förundersökningar tillsammans med utredare och åklagare. Det kan därför hända att du kommer att behöva närvara vid förhandling i domstol som vittne eller sakkunnig för att beskriva din undersökning. Utöver detta kommer du även arbeta med reparation av skadade enheter för att möjliggöra extraktion, t.ex. byte av skärm på en mobiltelefon. Arbetet innefattar även dokumentation av beslagtaget gods samt utfört uppdrag.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer
   

  

 IT-forensiker
   

  

 Krav
   

  

* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT-säkerhet/IT-forensik, alternativt annan arbetslivserfarenhet eller utbildning som myndigheten bedömer relevant
* Bred kunskap inom IT
* Erfarenhet av administration, felsökning eller konfiguration av operativsystem
* God vana att navigera i och konfigurera mobila enheter baserade på iOS och Android
* Mycket goda kunskaper att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift på svenska
* Goda kunskaper att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift på engelska
* Körkort B


 Meriter
   

  

* Erfarenhet inom hårdvara/elektronik
* Erfarenhet av brottsutredning
* Erfarenheter av Live Forensics/RAM-dump med analys
* Kunskap om programmering, t.ex. Python eller utveckling av mobilapplikationer
* Erfarenhet av arbete med databaser, t.ex. att skriva SQL-frågor
* Erfarenhet av nätverksforensik, t.ex. att analysera trafik i PCAP-filer
* Vana av arbete med fordonselektronik, t.ex. byte av integrerade komponenter
* Fördjupad kunskap om filsystem, t.ex. återskapande av raderat data
* Kunskaper i annat språk utöver svenska och engelska som myndigheten bedömer relevant


 IT-handläggare
   

  

 Krav
   

  

* Genomförd gymnasial utbildning med teknisk inriktning, alternativt annan gymnasial utbildning och erfarenhet som myndigheten bedömer som relevant
* Bred kunskap inom IT
* Mycket goda kunskaper att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift på svenska
* Goda kunskaper att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift på engelska
* Körkort B


 Meriter
   

  

* God vana att navigera i och konfigurera mobila enheter baserade på iOS och Android
* Erfarenhet av IT-forensiskt arbete
* Erfarenhet av komponentutbyte i mobila enheter, t.ex. byte av skärm
* Erfarenhet av brottsutredning
* Kunskaper i annat språk utöver svenska och engelska som myndigheten bedömer relevant


 Personliga egenskaper
   

  

 IT-forensiker och IT-handläggare har båda samma krav på personliga egenskaper. Arbetsuppgifterna ställer krav på att du har hög integritet och ett professionellt förhållningssätt. Dessutom krävs god förmåga att arbeta i grupp med stort enskilt ansvarstagande mot gruppens gemensamma mål, men du ska också kunna arbeta självständigt. Du har god social kompetens och bra kontakt- och samarbetsförmåga inom och utom polisen. Du är flexibel, strukturerad, noggrann och har ordningssinne. Du har en stark ambition att utvecklas i din yrkesroll genom att lära dig nya arbetssätt och metoder. Du kommer att få se material i ditt arbete som kan upplevas som obehagligt eller stötande. Det kan bland annat innehålla personer som utsatts för brott, till exempel dokumenterade övergrepp. Därför är det viktigt att du är trygg, stabil och kan förhålla dig till sådant material, samt att du inte har svårigheter att berätta om dina erfarenheter och upplevelser för kollegor och ledare.
   

  

 Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Daniel Takayama, Gruppchef
   

  

 010-563 54 88
   

  

 Fackliga företrädare
   

  

 Polisförbundet (Per Wedsmark 010-56 32 223), SACO-S, ST och SEKO nås via Polisens växel 114 14
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Arbetsort: Solna, Västberga eller Kungsholmen. I samband med din ansökan ber vi dig ange önskad placering/placeringar, men i slutänden är det verksamhetens behov som styr.
   

  

 Arbetstid: Veckoplanerad arbetstid 40h/v (VP 5:2)
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Funktion: IT-forensiker alt IT-handläggare
   

  

 Anställningsbenämning: Handläggare/Polisassistent
   

  

 Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället. Kompletterande bedömningsmetoder såsom arbetsprov kommer tillämpas i rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

 Vi använder e-rekrytering för att effektivisera och kvalitetssäkra rekryteringsarbetet. Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Polisens rekryteringsstöd Visma Recruit.
   

  

 Har du skyddade personuppgifter, referenser eller liknande information som du själv bedömer som skyddsvärd rekommenderar vi att du kontaktar ansvarig HR-konsult innan du går vidare med din ansökan.
   

  

 Om du vill komplettera din ansökan vänder du dig till ansvarig HR-konsult.
   

  

 En anställning hos Polismyndigheten kan komma att inledas med en provanställning om sex månader.
   

  

 Polismyndigheten är Sveriges största myndighet. Vi erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som stimulerar till mångfald, kreativitet och personlig utveckling.
   

  

 Läs gärna om våra förmåner som anställd hos polisen på: polisen.se/erbjudande
   

  

 Vi bedriver vår verksamhet enligt vår värdegrund: engagemang, effektivitet och tillgänglighet. Som medarbetare inom polisen agerar du för likabehandling. Det är en förutsättning för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och för polisens legitimitet i samhället. Som företrädare för polisen respekterar du allas lika värde och skapar förtroende för polisen.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om polisen och vår verksamhet på www.polisen.se
   

 polisen.se
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Vi undanber oss samtal och mail från dig som vill sälja annons- och rekryteringstjänster.
   

  

 Sök jobbet
   

  

 Ansökan sker via polisens rekryteringsverktyg

title: Embedded Solution Architect (ESA)
description:
**Build your future with Sovos.**
 If you're seeking a career where innovation meets impact, you've come to the right place. As a global leader, Sovos is transforming tax compliance from a business requirement to a force for growth while revolutionising how businesses navigate the ever-changing regulatory landscape.
   

  

 At Sovos, we're dedicated to more than just solving compliance challenges – we're committed to making a positive and lasting difference in everything we do. Our teams operate on the modern edge of digital technology, working not only to solve complex business challenges but also to enrich our personal, professional, and local communities.
   

  

 Our purpose-built systems provide the tools you need to thrive in a world where governments demand increased visibility, faster reporting and greater control over business processes. Excited about the possibilities? So are we!
   

  

 Don’t worry if you don't check all the boxes – apply anyway! We're focused on hiring the right people, not just the "right" resume. It's not about what you've done elsewhere; it's all about what you're capable of doing here.
   

  

**The Work You’ll Do**
 We are seeking a Sovos compliance knowledgeable Embedded Solution Architect (ESA) to drive the success of our embedded Independent Software Vendor (ISV) partners through strategic onboarding, technical enablement, and ongoing technical relationship management. This role primarily focuses on Sovos product technical expertise but also requires solid business acumen and collaboration skills to ensure our embedded partners maximize value from our platform while accelerating their time-to-market and revenue growth.
   

  

**More Specifically You Will**
 Partner Onboarding & Enablement
   

  

* Guide our partners through every step of their journey—from the first technical discovery to full production rollout and beyond. You’ll blend high-level strategic vision with technical expertise, ensuring seamless integrations that drive mutual success and lasting relationships.
* Lead technical discovery sessions with partner engineering teams to understand ISVs system architecture, data models, and integration requirements. Design optimal API integration patterns including RESTful APIs, webhooks, and real-time streaming connections. Evaluate authentication methods (OAuth 2.0, JWT, API keys) and recommend security best practices for each partner's specific use case. Architect data synchronization strategies, error handling protocols, and rate limiting approaches that scale with partner growth
* Design and execute comprehensive technical onboarding programs for embedded partners that educate partners on Sovos integration and usage best practices while ensuring a smooth technical integration leading to delivering great solutions in a timely manner.
* Serve as the primary technical point of contact throughout the partners lifecycle; build and maintain strong relationships with partner technical leaders, architects, and development leads.
* Advise on the design on comprehensive testing frameworks for partner integrations including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end validation scenarios. Establish automated testing pipelines using tools like Postman, Newman, or custom test harnesses to validate API functionality across different environments.
* Create performance benchmarking protocols to ensure integrations meet latency and throughput requirements. Implement monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify integration issues and API performance degradation
* Leverage deep understanding of our products and global e-invoicing and tax regulations to advise ISVs on the most suitable solutions for their product landscape. Partner with our compliance teams to embed the latest regulatory requirements into every integration


 Strategic Growth & Optimization
   

  

* Analyze partner technical usage patterns and business metrics to identify expansion opportunities
* Develop technical strategies to help partners optimize their integrations and improve performance
* Support partners in achieving technical milestones, certifications, and go-to-market objectives
* Facilitate connections between partners and relevant internal stakeholders for joint initiatives
* Monitor partner health metrics and proactively address risks to partnership success


 Cross-functional Collaboration
   

  

* Collaborate with internal engineering, professional services, product, and support teams to resolve technical issues and feature requests
* Work closely with Sales, Partner Account Managers, Professional Services, Support and Marketing teams to ensure aligned partner experience
* Collaborate with Product Management to influence roadmap based on partner feedback and requirements
* Partner with Engineering teams to resolve complex technical issues and drive product improvements
* Support Business Development in technical aspects of new partner evaluations and negotiations


**What We Need From You**
 Technical Skills
   

  

* Deep knowledge of Sovos Compliance technologies including eInvoicing and/or eReporting
* Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or related technical field highly recommended
* 5+ years of experience in technical customer-facing roles (Customer Success, Solutions Engineering, or Technical Account Management)
* Demonstrated experience working with ISV / embedded partners, with in-depth knowledge of ordering, purchasing, and invoice generation and exchange processes.
* Strong understanding of software development lifecycles, APIs, cloud architectures, and integration patterns
* Experience with modern development technologies (REST APIs, microservices, containerization, CI/CD)
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and DevOps practices
* Knowledge of enterprise software ecosystems and SaaS business models


 Business & Relationship Skills
   

  

* Proven track record of managing complex technical relationships with enterprise clients or partners
* Experience in partner ecosystem management, channel partnerships, or ISV relationships preferred
* Strong project management skills with ability to coordinate multiple stakeholder initiatives
* Excellent communication skills with ability to translate technical concepts for business audiences
* Experience conducting executive-level presentations and technical reviews


*Sovos is an equal opportunity employer committed to providing an environment that celebrates diversity and where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and employees. We do not discriminate against race, color, religions, national origin, age, sex, marital status, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic provided by law. At Sovos, all employees are encouraged to bring their whole selves to work.*
**Company Background**
 Sovos is a global provider of tax, compliance and trust solutions and services that enable businesses to navigate an increasingly regulated world with true confidence. Purpose-built for always-on compliance capabilities, our scalable IT-driven solutions meet the demands of an evolving and complex global regulatory landscape. Sovos’ cloud-based software platform provides an unparalleled level of integration with business applications and government compliance processes.
   

  

 More than 100,000 customers in 100+ countries – including half the Fortune 500 – trust Sovos for their compliance needs. Sovos annually processes more than three billion transactions across 19,000 global tax jurisdictions. Bolstered by a robust partner program more than 400 strong, Sovos brings to bear an unrivaled global network for companies across industries and geographies. Founded in 1979, Sovos has operations across the Americas and Europe, and is owned by Hg and TA Associates. For more information visit http://www.sovos.com and follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter.

title: Handläggare
description:
Dina arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Anställningen är placerad på Södra åklagarkammaren i Stockholm, Flemingsberg. Som handläggare möter du en händelserik vardag med varierande arbetsuppgifter.
   

  

 Du arbetar självständigt men också tillsammans i grupp för att få det administrativa arbetet att fungera. Service är en stor del i ditt vardagliga arbete, både internt och externt.
   

  

**I Arbetsuppgifterna Ingår Bl.a. Att**
* ge åklagare administrativt stöd, t.ex. arbete i brottmålsdiariet, hantera arkivering och utföra allmänna kontorsuppgifter
* kontrollera, bedöma och registrera inkomna ärenden
* vara kontakten utåt i många sammanhang och därmed ge god service till både allmänheten och till andra myndigheter – främst via telefon och e-post
* utföra arbetsuppgifter som fördelas från de vice administrativa cheferna


 Vardagen är händelsestyrd och det kan snabbt inkomma brådskande ärenden som gör att du behöver ta snabba beslut och kunna göra en avvägning av vad som är brådskande eller inte.
   

  

 Dina kvaliteter och kvalifikationer
   

  

 Vi söker dig som
   

  

* har gymnasieexamen eller annan utbildning som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdig
* har aktuell och relevant skicklighet som motsvarar några års väl vitsordat arbete med administrativa uppgifter
* har aktuell och relevant erfarenhet av arbete i it-miljö och med digitala verktyg inom administration, telefoni, möten m.m.
* har goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift.


 Som person vill vi att du
   

  

* är noggrann, strukturerad och kan följa de förhållningsregler och rutiner som finns
* är självständig och ansvarstagande
* är stresstålig då arbetsbelastningen vid vissa tillfällen kan vara hög
* är stabil med god självkännedom
* har lätt för att samarbeta och har ett öppet förhållningssätt gentemot din omgivning
* är serviceinriktad
* har god kommunikationsförmåga.


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

 Det är meriterande med erfarenhet av arbete inom rättsväsendet.
   

  

 Om anställningen
   

  

 Anställningen är en tillsvidareanställning med sex månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Inför erbjudande om anställning kan det bli aktuellt för Åklagarmyndigheten att genomföra registerkontroll i misstankeregistret och belastningsregistret. Registerkontrollen genomförs på slutkandidaten.
   

  

 Tester kan förekomma i rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

 Åklagarmyndigheten är en beredskapsmyndighet. Vid en anställning kan du komma att krigsplaceras på Åklagarmyndigheten. Läs mer under Jobba hos oss.
   

  

 På grund av arkivbestämmelser sparar vi ansökningar i två år. När du ansöker kommer dina personuppgifter att behandlas enligt offentlighetsprincipen samt dataskyddsförordningen. När du skickar din ansökan till oss, samtycker du till detta.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du skickar in din ansökan på svenska.
   

  

 Åklagarmyndigheten som arbetsgivare
   

  

 På Åklagarmyndigheten känner vi stolthet när vi går till jobbet. Tillsammans är vi över 2 200 engagerade och kompetenta medarbetare som står upp för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och demokratiska värden. Oavsett roll i myndigheten så bidrar alla till vårt viktiga samhällsuppdrag.
   

  

 Vill du bli en del av Åklagarmyndigheten? Vi strävar efter att vara en välkomnande och inkluderande arbetsplats som speglar samhällets mångfald.
   

  

 Ansök redan i dag!

title: Data Scientist within Component Lifetime Prognostics
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 We are now looking for an experienced Data Scientist to strengthen the Component Prognostics team within the Connected Analytics unit. You will be working as part of an agile team to enable various units within TRATON R&D worldwide in creating predictive component models. As part of the team, you will participate in the short- and long-term planning of deliveries and technologies, the prioritization and according implementation.
   

  

 Before all, you will bring in your competence to develop predictive component models for the brands’ connected services to improve the customers’ uptime, based on the connected data of a fleet of a several hundred thousand vehicles. You will cooperate tightly with upstream and downstream partners (data engineers, data consumers, analysts and product and service owners) as well as with domain experts for the components of the vehicles.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Develop models for vehicle components to predict remaining useful life and maintenance intervals for individual vehicles based on connected vehicle data
* Take ownership for the complete life-cycle of the solutions you create, from requirements, planning, implementation to maintenance and continuous improvements
* Accelerate and scale the team’s efforts by applying latest technologies and methods in the field of data science and AI
* Contribute to the continuous improvement process of the team and share your knowledge to support the journey to being a data-driven and AI-ready company
* Ensure reliable, scalable and cyber secure solutions by applying and continuously improving the team’s DevSecOps methods
* Keep a clear focus on the value for the customers of the group’s brands Scania, MAN and International


**Who You Are**
 As a person, you are analytical and delivery-oriented, with a genuine technical interest. You enjoy collaboration with different competences to improve your skills continuously and to find the best possible solution to a problem. Establishing a personal network within the organization is easy for you.
   

  

 As an experienced data scientist, you have worked with large scale data sets and industrial solutions in cloud environments. You show professional habits and skills when it comes to tooling, coding, testing, deploying and documentation. You have a proven track record in at least some of the relevant areas of the field such as statistics, machine learning, data processing, DevSecOps, data- and ML-pipelining, predictive maintenance, cloud infrastructure.
   

  

 Having been engaged in component modelling and the automotive industry previously is a merit.
   

  

 Your work is based on the following (or comparable) skills and tooling (examples): Python / SQL, AWS, CICD, Gitlab, Snowflake / Databricks.
   

  

 You have an academic education at university level in computer science, engineering physics, electrical engineering or equivalent work experience. You communicate fluently in English, in both speech and writing.
   

  

**This Is Us**
 Our unit is part of the Connected Vehicle Data and Analytics section within the Cloud Embedded Platform domain of TRATON R&D, which is the global development organization for the brands Scania and MAN in Europe and the brand International in the US. With our global organization, we deliver innovative and sustainable solutions with the customer value at the heart of everything.
   

  

 The team Component Prognostics is part of a line- and flow-organization which is working globally according to SAFe. Within our organization, we value a culture of collaboration and learning, with respect for the individual. Within our team, you have the opportunity to shape your work and the future of the transportation industry with us.
   

  

**Scania Offers**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-12-10. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:
   

  

 Frank Deubzer, Group Manager, frank.deubzer@scania.com
   

  

 We look forward to your application!

title: Backend Engineers - Fintech Group
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 We are looking for experienced
 **Software Engineers** 
 who can develop production-level microservices to join our
 **Fintech group** 
 here at Wolt.
   

  

 Our Engineering organization at Wolt consists of 700+ Engineers working across 70+ product teams. Some of us work on the visible parts, making our services easy on the eye and some of us focus on the unseen magic happening behind the scenes. ✨
   

  

 Our Engineers handle the whole development process (business logic, testing, database & data streaming, CI/CD, analytics, cloud) in an autonomous manner. They build things that are accessible and made to scale. They keep our systems in the best shape by simplifying the unnecessary complexity.
   

  

 We make the decisions as a team and group of teams for our ways of working and we take architectural decisions together. Everyone plays a role in our future.
   

  

 Our Engineers choose the best technologies that work for Wolt, their teams and themselves. Making good choices means finding scalable, robust technology that works in everyone’s best interests. The freedom to experiment and adopt the best technology benefits everyone.
   

  

 The main stack for these roles consists for example
 **Kotlin** 
 (Ktor, Koin, Spring, grpc…),
 **Golang** 
 (Echo),
 **PostgreSQL** 
 ,
 **MongoDB** 
 ,
 **Kafka** 
 ,
 **Redis** 
 ,
 **GitHub Actions** 
 ,
 **AWS** 
 ,
 **Docker** 
 and
 **Kubernetes** 
 .
   

  

 Needless to say, in such an environment there’s a lot of room for learning, teaching and growing together!
   

  

 Go ahead and check our Kotlin- & Golang-related Tech Talks below.
   

  

* The very fresh Scaling Kotlin Backend Development Podcast
* Kotlin at Wolt
* Kotlin Meetup
* Golang Tech Talks


 FinTech Group
   

  

 FinTech Group is dedicated to shaping the future of financial services at Wolt. 🚀 Our Fintech teams play a critical role in enabling smooth and automated money flows for our customers, merchants, and courier partners as well as delivering financial products to them. To meet local requirements and provide the best financial solutions, our Fintech engineering teams are at the forefront of building integrations and automating financial processes for local country teams, supporting expansion in our existing markets and into new ones. Our focus has been also on building Consumer Fintech, introducing brand-new products and bringing innovations that elevate the financial experience for all our users.
   

  

 We currently have multiple roles in our Fintech Teams, and depending on your experience, we will make sure to find the right team for you if you love working with modern technologies like Kotlin, are always open to learning new things, find motivation in working with skilled and nice colleagues, and don't shy away from highly challenging engineering topics, you'll fit right in! 💡👩‍💻
   

  

 📍This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Stockholm, or our newest addition, Timisoara. Read more about our hybrid and remote setup here. If you live outside of these countries, don't worry! We provide relocation support to help you make your way to Finland or Sweden.
   

  

 Our humble expectations
   

  

 We'd love to see experience with
 **Kotlin or any other JVM backend languages like Java and Scala** 
 but encourage you to convince us about your learning abilities if you come from a different background. 🛠️
   

  

 As a member of our team, you'll dive into the world of
 **microservices** 
 , primarily using Kotlin, while remaining open to exploring other modern languages, such as
 **Go** 
 and
 **Python** 
 , in some teams. We appreciate previous experience in handling the whole development cycle all the way to production.
   

  

 But what truly sets you apart is your ability to tackle big challenges together, envision scalability and availability, and dare to question conventional decisions. You’ll be successful in our teams if you quickly grasp new concepts and thrive in an environment of continuous learning.🌟
   

  

 We put a lot of focus on the ability to collaborate well with others. We work closely with our teammates and having a good connection with team members is essential. We understand that everyone has their own unique way of communicating with others. We expect you to be yourself, express your opinions, and work together with the rest of the team.
   

  

 In addition to technical expertise, we cherish those who take ownership beyond the obvious, have an insatiable hunger for knowledge, make collaborative decisions, and enthusiastically collaborate with diverse teams Woltwide. We value the unique perspectives and skills you bring to our adventure, and we're excited to see what you can achieve with us! 👥 🚀
   

  

 Fluency in English language is mandatory.
   

  

 Next steps
   

  

 During the initial screening call our Talent Acquisition Partner will discuss with you your expectations and possible domain preferences as well as share more about different teams. After the recruiter screening call, the interviewing steps are conducted and a specific team being proposed at the end of the process - that’s the moment when you’ll latest get to meet your possible Team Lead. Throughout the process, we will do our best to match your experience, skills and aspirations with the most suitable team at Wolt!
   

  

 For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Severi Kausola - severi.kausola@wolt.com
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.
